a:4:{s:12:"antispam-bee";a:29:{s:4:"name";s:12:"Antispam Bee";s:4:"slug";s:12:"antispam-bee";s:7:"version";s:6:"2.11.3";s:6:"author";s:57:"<a href="https://pluginkollektiv.org">pluginkollektiv</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:47:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/pluginkollektiv/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.5";s:6:"tested";s:5:"6.2.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.2";s:16:"requires_plugins";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";i:96;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:190;i:4;i:2;i:3;i:1;i:2;i:1;i:1;i:8;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:202;s:15:"support_threads";i:6;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:1;s:10:"downloaded";i:7623419;s:12:"last_updated";s:22:"2023-04-13 10:15am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2009-01-10";s:8:"homepage";s:40:"https://antispambee.pluginkollektiv.org/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:2502:"<p>Say Goodbye to comment spam on your WordPress blog or website. <em>Antispam Bee</em> blocks spam comments and trackbacks effectively, without captchas and without sending personal information to third party services. It is free of charge, ad-free and 100% GDPR compliant.</p>
<h3>Feature/Settings Overview</h3>
<ul>
<li>Trust approved commenters.</li>
<li>Trust commenters with a Gravatar.</li>
<li>Consider the comment time.</li>
<li>Allow comments only in a certain language.</li>
<li>Block or allow commenters from certain countries.</li>
<li>Treat BBCode links as spam.</li>
<li>Validate the IP address of commenters.</li>
<li>Use regular expressions.</li>
<li>Search local spam database for commenters previously marked as spammers.</li>
<li>Notify admins by e-mail about incoming spam.</li>
<li>Delete existing spam after n days.</li>
<li>Limit approval to comments/pings (will delete other comment types).</li>
<li>Select spam indicators to send comments to deletion directly.</li>
<li>Optionally exclude trackbacks and pingbacks from spam detection.</li>
<li>Optionally spam-check comment forms on archive pages.</li>
<li>Display spam statistics on the dashboard, including daily updates of spam detection rate and a total of blocked spam comments.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Support</h3>
<ul>
<li>Community support via the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/antispam-bee" rel="ugc">support forums on wordpress.org</a></li>
<li>Read <a href="https://antispambee.pluginkollektiv.org/documentation/" rel="nofollow ugc">the documentation</a></li>
<li>We don’t handle support via e-mail, Twitter, GitHub issues etc.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Contribute</h3>
<ul>
<li>Active development of this plugin is handled <a href="https://github.com/pluginkollektiv/antispam-bee" rel="nofollow ugc">on GitHub</a>.</li>
<li>Pull requests for documented bugs are highly appreciated.</li>
<li>If you think you’ve found a bug (e.g. you’re experiencing unexpected behavior), please post at the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/antispam-bee" rel="ugc">support forums</a> first.</li>
<li>If you want to help us translate this plugin you can do so <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/antispam-bee" rel="nofollow ugc">on WordPress Translate</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Credits</h3>
<ul>
<li>Author: <a href="https://sergejmueller.github.io/" rel="nofollow ugc">Sergej Müller</a></li>
<li>Maintainers: <a href="https://pluginkollektiv.org" rel="nofollow ugc">pluginkollektiv</a></li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:558:"<ul>
<li>If you don’t know how to install a plugin for WordPress, <a href="https://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins#Installing_Plugins" rel="nofollow ugc">here’s how</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Requirements</h3>
<ul>
<li>PHP 5.2.4 or greater</li>
<li>WordPress 4.5 or greater</li>
</ul>
<h3>Settings</h3>
<p>After you have activated <em>Antispam Bee</em> the plugin will block spam comments out of the box. However, you may want to visit <em>Settings → Antispam Bee</em> to configure your custom set of anti-spam options that works best for your site.</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:4598:"
<dt id='does%20antispam%20bee%20prevents%20spam%20registrations%20or%20protects%20form%20plugins%3F'>
Does Antispam Bee prevents spam registrations or protects form plugins?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Antispam Bee works best with default WordPress comments. It does not help to protect form plugins and does not prevent spam registrations. Hopefully we can provide better hooks for third party plugins to use Antispam Bee to fill this gap in the forthcoming new major version.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20antispam%20bee%20work%20with%20jetpack%2C%20wpdiscuz%2C%20disqus%20comments%20and%20similar%20comment%20plugins%3F'>
Does Antispam Bee work with Jetpack, wpDiscuz, Disqus Comments and similar comment plugins?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Antispam Bee works best with default WordPress comments. It is not compatible with Jetpack, wpDiscuz or Disqus Comments as those plugins load a new comment form within an iframe. Thus Antispam Bee can not access the comment form directly.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20antispam%20bee%20work%20with%20ajax%20comment%20plugins%20or%20similar%20theme%20features%3F'>
Does Antispam Bee work with AJAX comment plugins or similar theme features?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Whether Antispam Bee works with a comment form submitted via AJAX depends on how the AJAX request is made. If the request goes to the file that usually also receives the comments, Antispam Bee could work with it out of the box (the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-ajaxify-comments/" rel="ugc">WP Ajaxify Comments</a> plugin does this, for example).</p>
<p>If the comments are sent to the <code>admin-ajax.php</code>, the <code>antispam_bee_disallow_ajax_calls</code> filter must be used to run ASB for requests to that file as well. If the script does not send all form data to the file, but only some selected ones, further customization is probably necessary, as <a href="https://torstenlandsiedel.de/2020/10/04/ajaxifizierte-kommentare-und-antispam-bee/" rel="nofollow ugc">exemplified in this post by Torsten Landsiedel</a> (in German).</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20antispam%20bee%20store%20any%20private%20user%20data%2C%20and%20is%20it%20compliant%20with%20gdpr%3F'>
Does Antispam Bee store any private user data, and is it compliant with GDPR?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Antispam Bee is developed in Europe. You might have heard we can be a bit nitpicky over here when it comes to privacy. The plugin does not save private user data and is 100% compliant with GDPR.</p>
</p>
<dt id='will%20i%20have%20to%20edit%20any%20theme%20templates%20to%20get%20antispam%20bee%20to%20work%3F'>
Will I have to edit any theme templates to get Antispam Bee to work?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No, the plugin works as is. You may want to configure your favorite settings, though.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20antispam%20bee%20work%20with%20shortened%20ips%3F'>
Does Antispam Bee work with shortened IPs?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Generally yes. However, commissioning the Antispam Bee plugin for canceled or shortened IP addresses in comment metadata is not recommended. Because the name and the e-mail address of the comments are not unique, an IP address is the only reliable measure. The more complete the stored IP addresses, the more reliable the assignment or detection of spam.</p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20can%20i%20submit%20undetected%20spam%3F'>
How can I submit undetected spam?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If the antispam plugin has passed some spam comments, these comments can be reported for analysis. A <a href="http://goo.gl/forms/ITzVHXkLVL" rel="nofollow ugc">Google table</a> was created for this purpose.</p>
</p>
<dt id='antispam%20bee%20with%20varnish%3F'>
Antispam Bee with Varnish?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If WordPress is operated with Apache + Varnish, the actual IP address of the visitors does not appear in WordPress. Accordingly the Antispam-Plugin lacks the base for the correct functionality. An adaptation in the Varnish configuration file /etc/varnish/default.vcl provides a remedy and forwards the original (not from Apache) IP address in the HTTP header X-Forwarded-For:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>if (req.restarts == 0) {<br />
      set req.http.X-Forwarded-For = client.ip;<br />
  }</p>
</blockquote>
</p>
<dt id='are%20there%20some%20paid%20services%20or%20limitations%3F'>
Are there some paid services or limitations?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No, Antispam Bee is free forever, for both private and commercial projects. You can use it on as many sites as you want. There is no limitation to the number of sites you use the plugin on.</p>
<p>A complete documentation is available on <a href="https://antispambee.pluginkollektiv.org/documentation/" rel="nofollow ugc">pluginkollektiv.org</a>.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:9411:"<h3>2.11.3</h3>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Multiselect for &#8220;Delete comments by spam reasons&#8221; was not saving values</li>
<li>Fix: Fix broken link for ISO country codes</li>
<li>Maintenance: Added test for PHP 8.2</li>
<li>Maintenance: Tested up to WordPress 6.2</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.11.2</h3>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: remove superfluous translations</li>
<li>Tweak: make FAQ link an anchor link</li>
<li>Fix: spam counter no longer raises a warning with PHP 8.1 if no spam is present yet</li>
<li>Fix: spam reasons are now localized correctly</li>
<li>Fix: Translations were loaded twice on some admin pages</li>
<li>Maintenance: Tested up to WordPress 6.1</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.11.1</h3>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: remove superfluous type attribute from inline script tag</li>
<li>Maintenance: Tested up to WordPress 6.0</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.11.0</h3>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Allow empty comments if <code>allow_empty_comment</code> is set to true</li>
<li>Fix: Add <code>aria-label</code> to work around bug in a11y testing tools</li>
<li>Fix: Change priority for <code>comment_form_field_comment</code> from 10 to 99</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated some FAQ entries</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated build tooling</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.10.0</h3>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Switch from ip2country.info to iplocate.io for country check</li>
<li>Enhancement: Use filter to add the honeypot field instead of output buffering for new installations and added option to switch between the both ways</li>
<li>Tweak: Added comment user agent to regex pattern check</li>
<li>Tweak: Make the ping detection filterable to support new comment types</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated internal documentation links</li>
<li>Tweak: Several updates and optimizations in the testing process</li>
<li>Tweak: Adjust color palette to recent WP version</li>
<li>Tweak: Adjust wording in variables and option names</li>
<li>Readme: Add new contributor and clean up unused code</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.9.4</h3>
<ul>
<li>Enhancement: Add filter to allow ajax calls</li>
<li>Tweak: Better wording for BBCode feature in plugin description</li>
<li>Tweak: Better screenshots in the plugin directory</li>
<li>Maintenance: Tested up to WordPress 5.7</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.9.3</h3>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Compatibility with WordPress 5.5</li>
<li>Fixed: Undefined index on spam list page</li>
<li>Tweak: Better wording on settings page</li>
<li>Tweak: AMP compatibility</li>
<li>Tweak: Protect CSS from overwrite through bad themes</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.9.2</h3>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Delete comment meta for deleted old spam. For the cleanup of older orphaned comment meta we suggest the usage of <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-sweep/" rel="ugc">WP Sweep</a></li>
<li>Fix: Statistic in dashboard showed wrong value</li>
<li>Tweak: Change autocomplete attribute to &#8220;new-password&#8221;</li>
<li>Tweak: Autoptimize compatibility improved</li>
<li>Tweak: Renamed blacklist/whitelist to a better phrase</li>
<li>Tweak: Added new pattern</li>
<li>Tweak: UI and text optimizations</li>
<li>Tweak: Better compatibility with some server configurations</li>
<li>Tweak: Make spam reason sortable and filterable</li>
<li>Tweak: Add spam reason for manually marked spam</li>
<li>Maintenance: Deleted unused code</li>
<li>Maintenance: Removed Fake IP check (unreliable and producing false positives)</li>
<li>Maintenance: Fix some coding standard issues</li>
<li>Maintenance: Tested up to WordPress 5.4</li>
<li>Maintenance: Tested up to PHP 7.4</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.9.1</h3>
<ul>
<li>Improved backend accessibility</li>
<li>Prefilled comment textareas do now work with the honeypot</li>
<li>Compatible with the AMP plugin (https://wordpress.org/plugins/amp/)</li>
<li>Improved dashboard tooltips</li>
<li>Improvements for the language detection API</li>
<li>Scalable IP look up for local spam database</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.9.0</h3>
<ul>
<li>Introduction of coding standards.</li>
<li>Switch to franc language detection API for the language check.</li>
<li>Do not longer overwrite the IP address WordPress saves with the comment by using <code>pre_comment_user_ip</code>.</li>
<li>Do not show &#8220;Trust commenters with a Gravatar&#8221; if the &#8220;Show Gravatar&#8221; option is not set.</li>
<li>Skip the checks, when I ping myself.</li>
<li>Fixes some wrong usages of the translation functions.</li>
<li>Use the regular expressions check also for trackbacks.</li>
<li>Add option to delete Antispam Bee related data when plugin gets deleted via the admin interface.</li>
<li>Save a hashed + salted IP for every comment</li>
<li>New check for incoming trackbacks.</li>
<li>Introduction of behat tests.</li>
<li>Updates the used JavaScript library for the statistics widget.</li>
<li>Bugfix in the &#8220;Comment form used outside of posts&#8221; option.</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.8.1</h3>
<ul>
<li>PHP 5.3 compatibility</li>
<li>Bugfix where a spam trackback produced a fatal error</li>
<li>For more details see https://github.com/pluginkollektiv/antispam-bee/milestone/8?closed=1</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.8.0</h3>
<ul>
<li>Removed stopforumspam.com to avoid potential GDPR violation</li>
<li>Improves IP handling to comply with GDPR</li>
<li>Improves PHP7.2 compatibility</li>
<li>Fixes small bug on mobile views</li>
<li>Allow more than one language in language check</li>
<li>Minor interface improvements</li>
<li>Remove old russian and Dutch translation files</li>
<li>For more details see https://github.com/pluginkollektiv/antispam-bee/milestone/4?closed=1</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixes an incompatibility with Chrome autofill</li>
<li>Fixes some incompatibilities with other plugins/themes where the comment field was left empty</li>

<li>A new filter to add languages to the language check</li>
<li>For more details see https://github.com/pluginkollektiv/antispam-bee/milestone/6?closed=1</li>
</ul>
<h3>2.7.0</h3>

</ul>

</ul>

Kit by Google &#8211; Analytics, Search Console, AdSense, Speed";s:4:"slug";s:15:"google-site-kit";s:7:"version";s:7:"1.106.0";s:6:"author";s:50:"<a href="https://opensource.google.com">Google</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:38:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/google/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"5.2";s:6:"tested";s:3:"6.3";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:16:"requires_plugins";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";i:82;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:514;i:4;i:34;i:3;i:23;i:2;i:31;i:1;i:108;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:710;s:15:"support_threads";i:214;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:174;s:10:"downloaded";i:78597471;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2023-07-31 6:23pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2019-10-31";s:8:"homepage";s:30:"https://sitekit.withgoogle.com";s:8:"sections";a:4:{s:11:"description";s:1998:"<p>Site Kit is the official WordPress plugin from Google for insights about how people find and use your site. Site Kit is the one-stop solution to deploy, manage, and get insights from critical Google tools to make the site successful on the web. It provides authoritative, up-to-date insights from multiple Google products directly on the WordPress dashboard for easy access, all for free.</p>
<h4>Bringing the best of Google tools to WordPress</h4>
<p>Site Kit includes powerful features that make using these Google products seamless and flexible:</p>
<ul>
<li>Easy-to-understand stats directly on your WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Official stats from multiple Google tools, all in one dashboard</li>
<li>Quick setup for multiple Google tools without having to edit the source code of your site</li>
<li>Metrics for your entire site and for individual posts</li>
<li>Easy-to-manage, granular permissions across WordPress and different Google products</li>
</ul>
<h4>Supported Google tools</h4>
<p>Site Kit shows key metrics and insights from different Google products:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Search Console:</strong> Understand how Google Search discovers and displays your pages in Google Search. Track how many people saw your site in Search results, and what query they used to search for your site.</li>
<li><strong>Analytics:</strong> Explore how users navigate your site and track goals you&#8217;ve set up for your users to complete.</li>
<li><strong>AdSense:</strong> Keep track of how much your site is earning you.</li>
<li><strong>PageSpeed Insights:</strong> See how your pages perform compared to other real-world sites. Improve performance with actionable tips from PageSpeed Insights.</li>
<li><strong>Tag Manager:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Tag Manager- no code editing required. Then, manage your tags in Tag Manager.</li>
<li><strong>Optimize:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Optimize- no code editing required. Then, set up A/B tests in Optimize.</li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:1809:"<p><strong>Note</strong>: Make sure that your website is live. If your website isn&#8217;t live yet, Site Kit can&#8217;t show you any data.<br />
However, if you have a staging environment in addition to your production site, Site Kit can display data from your production site in the staging environment. Learn how to use <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit/staging/" rel="nofollow ugc">Site Kit with a staging environment</a>.</p>
<h4>Installation from within WordPress</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins &gt; Add New</strong>.</li>
<li>Search for <strong>Site Kit by Google</strong>.</li>
<li>Install and activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>Manual installation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Upload the entire <code>google-site-kit</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory.</li>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins</strong>.</li>
<li>Activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>After activation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit the new <strong>Site Kit</strong> menu.</li>
<li>Follow the instructions in the setup flow.</li>
<li>Go to the main Site Kit dashboard which already displays key metrics from Search Console.</li>
<li>Connect additional Google tools under <strong>Site Kit &gt; Settings</strong>. Learn more about <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/getting-started/connecting-services/" rel="nofollow ugc">which tools are right for you</a>.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:4825:"<p>For more information, visit the <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/" rel="nofollow ugc">official Site Kit website</a>.</p>

<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20free%3F'>
Is Site Kit free?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The Site Kit plugin is free and open source, and will remain so. Individual Google products included in Site Kit are subject to standard terms and fees (if any) for those products.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20are%20the%20minimum%20requirements%20for%20site%20kit%3F'>
What are the minimum requirements for Site Kit?
</h4>
<p>
<p>In order to successfully install and use Site Kit, your site must meet the following requirements:</p>
<ul>
<li>WordPress version 5.2+</li>
<li>PHP version 5.6+</li>
<li>Modern browser – Internet Explorer is not supported</li>
<li>Is publicly accessible – it isn’t in maintenance mode, accessible only via password, or otherwise blocked</li>
<li>REST API is available – Site Kit must be able to communicate via REST API with Google services. To ensure that the REST API is available for your site, go to Tools &gt; Site Health.</li>
</ul>
</p>
<dt id='why%20is%20my%20dashboard%20showing%20%E2%80%9Cgathering%20data%E2%80%9D%20and%20none%20of%20my%20service%20data%3F'>
Why is my dashboard showing “gathering data” and none of my service data?
</h4>
<p>
<p>It can take a few days after connecting Site Kit to a Google service for data to begin to display in your dashboard. The “gathering data” message typically appears when you’ve recently set up a Google service (i.e. just created a new Analytics account) and/or your site is new, and data is not yet available for display.</p>
<p>If you are still seeing this message after a few days, feel free to get in touch with us on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/" rel="ugc">support forum</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='why%20aren%E2%80%99t%20any%20ads%20appearing%20on%20my%20site%20after%20i%20connected%20adsense%3F'>
Why aren’t any ads appearing on my site after I connected AdSense?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If you’re new to AdSense when you connect via Site Kit, your new AdSense account and your site will need to be manually reviewed and approved for ads by the AdSense team. Ads will not display until your account and site have been approved. <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/answer/76228" rel="nofollow ugc">Check out this guide for more information about the approval process and timeline.</a></p>
<p>You can check your approval status in Site Kit by going to <strong>Settings &gt; Connected Services &gt; AdSense</strong> and clicking <strong>Check your site status</strong>. This link will direct you to AdSense. If you see “Ready,” your account and site have been approved and should be displaying ads. If you see “Getting ready…,” your account and site are still under review and your site will not display ads until they have been approved.</p>
<p>If Site Kit has successfully added the AdSense snippet to your site and your account and site have been approved, but your site is still not showing ads, <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/#topic=3373519" rel="nofollow ugc">contact the AdSense Help Center for assistance</a>.</p>
<p>You can find more information on how Site Kit works with AdSense in our <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit/managing-adsense/" rel="nofollow ugc">Managing AdSense guide</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20gdpr%20compliant%3F'>
Is Site Kit GDPR compliant?
</h4>
<p>
<p>When using Site Kit, site owners are responsible for managing notice and consent requirements – including GDPR requirements – as described in <a href="https://policies.google.com/terms" rel="nofollow ugc">Google’s Terms of Service</a>.</p>
<p>By default, Site Kit does anonymize IP addresses upon activation of the Google Analytics module. This setting can be turned off in <strong>Site Kit &gt; Settings &gt; Analytics &gt; Anonymize IP addresses</strong>.</p>
<p>There are a number of third-party plugins that allow you to block Google Analytics, Tag Manager, or AdSense from capturing data until a visitor to the site consents. Some of these work natively with Site Kit by providing plugin-specific configurations. You can find out more about these by visiting our <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit/gdpr-compliance-and-privacy/" rel="nofollow ugc">GDPR compliance and privacy page</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20get%20additional%20support%3F'>
Where can I get additional support?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Please create a new topic on our <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/" rel="ugc">WordPress.org support forum</a>. Be sure to follow the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/guidelines/" rel="ugc">support forum guidelines</a> when posting.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:323757:"<h4>1.106.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update the Ad Blocking Recovery CTA text. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7357" rel="nofollow ugc">#7357</a>.</li>
<li>Update copy for the Ad Blocking Recovery setup screen, success notification and &#8220;existing tag&#8221; settings notice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7313" rel="nofollow ugc">#7313</a>.</li>
<li>Add a &#8220;Learn more&#8221; link after the &#8220;Place error protection tag&#8221; option in the AdSense setup flow and settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7295" rel="nofollow ugc">#7295</a>.</li>
<li>Update Ad Blocking Recovery message status language in settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7287" rel="nofollow ugc">#7287</a>.</li>
<li>Update key metric tiles to be full-width on mobile viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7159" rel="nofollow ugc">#7159</a>.</li>
<li>Hide Key Metric widget tiles when the feature isn&#8217;t setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7061" rel="nofollow ugc">#7061</a>.</li>
<li>Move Universal Analytics notice in settings page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6809" rel="nofollow ugc">#6809</a>.</li>
<li>Display Google Tag ID in Analytics Settings view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6769" rel="nofollow ugc">#6769</a>.</li>
<li>Replace direct usage of components from <code>@material/react-text-field</code> with the new <code>TextField</code> component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6651" rel="nofollow ugc">#6651</a>.</li>
<li>Hide Key Metric Widget area when Search Console and Google Analytics are still gathering data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6607" rel="nofollow ugc">#6607</a>.</li>
<li>Create &#8220;Top converting traffic source&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6255" rel="nofollow ugc">#6255</a>.</li>
<li>Add &#8220;Top cities driving traffic&#8221; key metric widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6252" rel="nofollow ugc">#6252</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for WooCommerce/Google Analytics with a key metric widget for &#8220;Most popular products by pageviews&#8221;. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6249" rel="nofollow ugc">#6249</a>.</li>
<li>Add the &#8220;Most engaged traffic source&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6246" rel="nofollow ugc">#6246</a>.</li>
<li>Show a tooltip when clicking &#8220;Maybe later&#8221; on the Key Metrics Setup CTA widget, and allow the widget to be dismissed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6232" rel="nofollow ugc">#6232</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix potential PHP error when refreshing profile data on the fly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7356" rel="nofollow ugc">#7356</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure AdSense CTA appears again if tooltip is ignored after dismissing the CTA widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7294" rel="nofollow ugc">#7294</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure setup success notification is always shown when completing setup for ad blocking recovery. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7288" rel="nofollow ugc">#7288</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AdSense options cleanup issues. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7286" rel="nofollow ugc">#7286</a>.</li>
<li>Fix the tag ID used in the GA tracking opt-out for logged in users when tagging with a Google tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7262" rel="nofollow ugc">#7262</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure the WordPress Dashboard submenu can be seen when Site Kit is the current page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6907" rel="nofollow ugc">#6907</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent layout shift in GA4 settings area when the dropdown options finish loading. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6570" rel="nofollow ugc">#6570</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.105.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improve formatting of larger numbers in Key Metric Widget tiles. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7190" rel="nofollow ugc">#7190</a>.</li>
<li>Place Ad Blocking Recovery tags on the front end. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7186" rel="nofollow ugc">#7186</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that could cause zero percent in key metric widgets not to appear. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7172" rel="nofollow ugc">#7172</a>.</li>
<li>Improve creation of the GM3 checkbox component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7120" rel="nofollow ugc">#7120</a>.</li>
<li>Show notice to users who have an existing Ad Blocking Recovery tag placed on their site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6967" rel="nofollow ugc">#6967</a>.</li>
<li>Fix inconsistent focus styles in feature tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6926" rel="nofollow ugc">#6926</a>.</li>
<li>Add CTA to connect Analytics if disconnected after setting up Key Metrics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6265" rel="nofollow ugc">#6265</a>.</li>
<li>Implement the &#8220;Top traffic source&#8221; key metric widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6245" rel="nofollow ugc">#6245</a>.</li>
<li>Implement the design for the Key Metrics Setup CTA widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6210" rel="nofollow ugc">#6210</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug that additionally requested UA Analytics reports on the WP dashboard when dashboard view was set to GA4. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7306" rel="nofollow ugc">#7306</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused PageSpeed Insights to appear in Dashboard Sharing Settings when PageSpeed Insights is not connected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7197" rel="nofollow ugc">#7197</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that could cause infinite loop in Analytics setup flow if user had view-only permissions for an Analytics property. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7168" rel="nofollow ugc">#7168</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused Ad Blocking Recovery widget to appear/hide under the wrong conditions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7164" rel="nofollow ugc">#7164</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.104.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add support for tagging with Google Analytics 4 in AMP mode. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7221" rel="nofollow ugc">#7221</a>.</li>
<li>Complete Ad Blocking Recovery set up interface. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6966" rel="nofollow ugc">#6966</a>.</li>
<li>Add infrastructure for fetching and storing the Ad Blocking Recovery tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6902" rel="nofollow ugc">#6902</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add PHP version to requests for features. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7209" rel="nofollow ugc">#7209</a>.</li>
<li>Add the Analytics dashboard type to Site Health information. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7119" rel="nofollow ugc">#7119</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure the Universal Analytics controls are shown in the case where the connected property belongs to another Google account and permission has been removed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7063" rel="nofollow ugc">#7063</a>.</li>
<li>Add settings controls for Ad blocking recovery tags. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6962" rel="nofollow ugc">#6962</a>.</li>
<li>Add ad blocking recovery state to the settings view for AdSense. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6961" rel="nofollow ugc">#6961</a>.</li>
<li>Show the Ad Blocking Recovery Notification on the Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6953" rel="nofollow ugc">#6953</a>.</li>
<li>Rework the Dialog component to use dialog components from the <code>googlesitekit-components</code> library instead of <code>@material/react-dialog</code> directly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6652" rel="nofollow ugc">#6652</a>.</li>
<li>Show a “Connect AdSense CTA” Key Metrics tile if AdSense is disconnected after setting up AdSense-related Key Metrics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6264" rel="nofollow ugc">#6264</a>.</li>
<li>Add the Connect GA tile to Key Metrics widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6263" rel="nofollow ugc">#6263</a>.</li>
<li>Create the &#8220;Top performing keywords&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6251" rel="nofollow ugc">#6251</a>.</li>
<li>Create the &#8220;Most popular content by pageviews&#8221; key metric widget tile. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6247" rel="nofollow ugc">#6247</a>.</li>
<li>Implement HaTS survey triggers for users who answers &#8220;Other&#8221; to any User Input question. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6180" rel="nofollow ugc">#6180</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate <code>TextField</code> component to our GM2 component library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6113" rel="nofollow ugc">#6113</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure Ad Blocking Recovery elements are only present when the feature is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/7179" rel="nofollow ugc">#7179</a>.</li>

<li>Follow API naming conventions for Analytics 4 field names. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6484" rel="nofollow ugc">#6484</a>.</li>
<li>Update logic for handling Google Tag detection. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6374" rel="nofollow ugc">#6374</a>.</li>
<li>Add a notification for users when their Google tag associations change. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6373" rel="nofollow ugc">#6373</a>.</li>
<li>Add a dedicated control for the Google Analytics 4 web data stream instead of a single property select. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6330" rel="nofollow ugc">#6330</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance survey infrastructure to be more flexible. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6306" rel="nofollow ugc">#6306</a>.</li>
<li>Conditionally render GA4 metrics in the Site Kit Admin Bar integration. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6221" rel="nofollow ugc">#6221</a>.</li>
<li>Update styling of entity search close button to not overlap with the input&#8217;s border. Props itsaladin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5980" rel="nofollow ugc">#5980</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance mechanism for dashboard sharing request context. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5780" rel="nofollow ugc">#5780</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Upgrade Guzzle, with <code>guzzlehttp/guzzle</code> updated to v6.5.8. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1146" rel="nofollow ugc">#1146</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug where Google Tag settings were not being saved when creating a new tag via the Analytics Settings page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6767" rel="nofollow ugc">#6767</a>.</li>
<li>Fix placement order of Google Tag banner notification. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6766" rel="nofollow ugc">#6766</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent triggering Google Tag lookups until scope is granted. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6764" rel="nofollow ugc">#6764</a>.</li>
<li>Fix potential <code>IntersectionObserver</code> error in banner notifications. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6674" rel="nofollow ugc">#6674</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.96.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update the Analytics 4 module to use its Google Tag for tracking opt-out if it is used in the snippet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6666" rel="nofollow ugc">#6666</a>.</li>
<li>Update all spinner buttons to be consistent across the codebase. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6571" rel="nofollow ugc">#6571</a>.</li>
<li>Add the new setting to the Analytics module to determine the dashboard type. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6540" rel="nofollow ugc">#6540</a>.</li>
<li>Update the cache clearing functionality to remove cache for old versions as well. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6487" rel="nofollow ugc">#6487</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance experience for existing users who need to grant a new Tag Manager scope for use with Google Tags. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6421" rel="nofollow ugc">#6421</a>.</li>
<li>Update the <code>getKeyMetrics()</code> selector to return the user-selected key metrics if set, otherwise the user input answer-based key metrics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6257" rel="nofollow ugc">#6257</a>.</li>
<li>Update the WordPress dashboard widget to use Analytics 4 widgets if they are allowed by the feature flag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6222" rel="nofollow ugc">#6222</a>.</li>
<li>Update Analytics and Search Console widgets to use GA4 versions if the feature flag is enabled for the site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6220" rel="nofollow ugc">#6220</a>.</li>
<li>Create the Analytics 4 version of the popular pages widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6219" rel="nofollow ugc">#6219</a>.</li>

<li>Add new widget for &#8220;All traffic&#8221; using GA4 as a data source. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6216" rel="nofollow ugc">#6216</a>.</li>
<li>Create Google Analytics 4 version of the <code>AdminBarSessions</code> widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6215" rel="nofollow ugc">#6215</a>.</li>
<li>Add the Analytics 4 version of the unique visitors tile in the admin bar. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6214" rel="nofollow ugc">#6214</a>.</li>
<li>Create a Google Analytics 4 alternative for the session duration widget on the WordPress dashboard page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6213" rel="nofollow ugc">#6213</a>.</li>

<h4>1.88.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Render one-off tooltips in a portal. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6049" rel="nofollow ugc">#6049</a>.</li>
<li>Update code integrating with Gutenberg to use React hooks instead, following the new WordPress version requirement of 5.2. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5876" rel="nofollow ugc">#5876</a>.</li>
<li>Remove now unnecessary polyfills for WordPress versions older than 5.2, according to new version requirement. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5875" rel="nofollow ugc">#5875</a>.</li>
<li>Raise minimum WordPress version requirement from 4.7 to 5.2. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5874" rel="nofollow ugc">#5874</a>.</li>
<li>Show Measurement ID instead of Property ID in Analytics 4 Property Select Dropdown when there is an existing GA4 Tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5145" rel="nofollow ugc">#5145</a>.</li>
<li>Link the Site Kit logo on the entity dashboard to the main dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4793" rel="nofollow ugc">#4793</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Avoid using _n() as a shortcut for singular/plural without using a number. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6069" rel="nofollow ugc">#6069</a>.</li>
<li>Update Tooltip styles to match GM2+ designs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6059" rel="nofollow ugc">#6059</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where the GA4 reminder tooltip in Analytics Settings was not appearing properly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6045" rel="nofollow ugc">#6045</a>.</li>
<li>Fix console error when viewing CoreSiteBannerNotifications stories. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5978" rel="nofollow ugc">#5978</a>.</li>
<li>Increase size of banner icons in setup notification. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5934" rel="nofollow ugc">#5934</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent dashboard from crashing when async SVG fails to load. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5605" rel="nofollow ugc">#5605</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.87.0</h4>
<p><strong>This version marks the 100th release of Site Kit 🎉</strong></p>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Implement custom Analytics events for the GA4 Activation Banner. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6042" rel="nofollow ugc">#6042</a>.</li>
<li>Update the <code>ReportError</code> component to add the module slug to the insufficient error codes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5987" rel="nofollow ugc">#5987</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure Banner Notifications stay visible and display a spinner when navigating to links via the CTA. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5974" rel="nofollow ugc">#5974</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance the BannerNotification component to better support a description which is a React element. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5972" rel="nofollow ugc">#5972</a>.</li>
<li>Add a <code>googlesitekit.components</code> global and entrypoint with Material 2 components. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5958" rel="nofollow ugc">#5958</a>.</li>
<li>Send active consumers data alongside the request to refresh an access token. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5569" rel="nofollow ugc">#5569</a>.</li>
<li>Update shared user metadata when accessing shared dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5568" rel="nofollow ugc">#5568</a>.</li>
<li>Dismiss main dashboard sharing tour if sharing settings tour is shown first. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5520" rel="nofollow ugc">#5520</a>.</li>
<li>Add multi-module support to module recovery API endpoint. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5298" rel="nofollow ugc">#5298</a>.</li>
<li>Update PageSpeed Insights widget to avoid layout shifts between loading and loaded states. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4878" rel="nofollow ugc">#4878</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update and simplify GitHub workflows to use v3 version of <code>setup-node</code> action. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5786" rel="nofollow ugc">#5786</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug that could cause a notification view event to be sent even when the notification doesn&#8217;t appear. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6023" rel="nofollow ugc">#6023</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused AdSense graphics in CTA banner to be loaded when not needed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6006" rel="nofollow ugc">#6006</a>.</li>
<li>Update the error boundary component styling to provide appropriate spacing between the main CTA button and the link to &#8220;Report this problem&#8221;. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/6005" rel="nofollow ugc">#6005</a>.</li>
<li>Fix module settings open/close issue when any key is pressed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5915" rel="nofollow ugc">#5915</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug that caused errors to appear in Analytics module when Tag Manager module is not available. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5074" rel="nofollow ugc">#5074</a>.</li>
</ul>

</ul>

<h4>1.82.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add the Google Analytics 4 Activation Banner to the Entity Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5673" rel="nofollow ugc">#5673</a>.</li>

<li>Add a &#8220;button with spinner&#8221; component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5271" rel="nofollow ugc">#5271</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Limit shared requests for Analytics reports to metrics and dimensions used by the Site Kit dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5711" rel="nofollow ugc">#5711</a>.</li>
<li>Flatten Thank with Google placement options in settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5683" rel="nofollow ugc">#5683</a>.</li>
<li>Show a list of features on the Thank with Google disconnection modal. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5661" rel="nofollow ugc">#5661</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure Thank with Google API results are filtered properly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5653" rel="nofollow ugc">#5653</a>.</li>
<li>Update Thank with Google JS snippet parameters to reflect API updates. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5535" rel="nofollow ugc">#5535</a>.</li>
<li>Truncate long usernames in Dashboard Sharing. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5500" rel="nofollow ugc">#5500</a>.</li>
<li>Only allow users with Tag Manager access to edit Tag Manager settings in the UI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5495" rel="nofollow ugc">#5495</a>.</li>
<li>Add the &#8220;Get Help&#8221; link to the compatibility error notice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5483" rel="nofollow ugc">#5483</a>.</li>

<h4>1.75.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add new experimental Interaction to Next Paint field metric to PageSpeed dashboard widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5207" rel="nofollow ugc">#5207</a>.</li>
<li>Update the &#8220;Skip to view-only dashboard&#8221; button text. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5176" rel="nofollow ugc">#5176</a>.</li>

<li>Update Analytics snippet toggle behavior to be disabled when the same property is set in the Tag Manager container. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/5141" rel="nofollow ugc">#5141</a>.</li>

<li>Fix a javascript error on the Analytics Unique Visitors tab of the Search Funnel widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4660" rel="nofollow ugc">#4660</a>.</li>
<li>Update the URL search input box to work correctly when HOME or END keys are pressed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4584" rel="nofollow ugc">#4584</a>.</li>
<li>Update plugin header to avoid obstructing feature tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4453" rel="nofollow ugc">#4453</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.49.1</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update Google Analytics 4 integration to use new <code>dataStreams</code> endpoint after breaking change in alpha API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4677" rel="nofollow ugc">#4677</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.49.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update source links on unified dashboard widgets to be consistent across all widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4570" rel="nofollow ugc">#4570</a>.</li>
<li>Annotate module endpoints which can be used with dashboard sharing. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4474" rel="nofollow ugc">#4474</a>.</li>
<li>Add <code>_googlesitekitDashboardSharingData</code> global data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4473" rel="nofollow ugc">#4473</a>.</li>
<li>Update styling of items in the Site Kit header for consistency. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4457" rel="nofollow ugc">#4457</a>.</li>
<li>Implement new UI for entity dashboard header containing title and URL. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4428" rel="nofollow ugc">#4428</a>.</li>
<li>Update entity search field to only show a valid result when unfocused. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4427" rel="nofollow ugc">#4427</a>.</li>
<li>Update the help menu to include the AdSense help menu item in all places when the AdSense module is active. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4423" rel="nofollow ugc">#4423</a>.</li>
<li>Update Tag Manager setup and settings edit views with loading indicator while tags are being checked. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4311" rel="nofollow ugc">#4311</a>.</li>
<li>Update widgets to use the <code>useInViewSelect</code> hook to fetch reports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4121" rel="nofollow ugc">#4121</a>.</li>
<li>Use only WordPress core&#8217;s bundled dependencies instead of Site Kit&#8217;s when integrating with the block editor. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4107" rel="nofollow ugc">#4107</a>.</li>
<li>Add the ability to programmatically disable modules using the <code>googlesitekit_available_modules</code> filter. Props henrywright. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3993" rel="nofollow ugc">#3993</a>.</li>
<li>Update the Idea Hub widget to display a spinner when saving, unsaving or dismissing an idea. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3907" rel="nofollow ugc">#3907</a>.</li>
</ul>

<ul>

<h4>1.43.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>

<li>Improve validation for domains used for Site Kit during setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1884" rel="nofollow ugc">#1884</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update the AdSense snippet to no longer include deprecated attributes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4180" rel="nofollow ugc">#4180</a>.</li>
<li>Fix permissions dialog issue on the WP dashboard page caused by Idea Hub CTA. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4125" rel="nofollow ugc">#4125</a>.</li>
<li>Update admin settings for consistency and introduce optional loading state for checkboxes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4038" rel="nofollow ugc">#4038</a>.</li>
<li>Update the modules list banner not to disable connected modules. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4014" rel="nofollow ugc">#4014</a>.</li>
<li>Improve the &#8220;Re-authentication needed&#8221; error messages and redirects. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3931" rel="nofollow ugc">#3931</a>.</li>
<li>Hide the <code>Impressions</code> column of the AdSense <code>Top Earning Pages</code> widget on mobile screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3781" rel="nofollow ugc">#3781</a>.</li>
<li>Update Optimize module settings to avoid the flash of use snippet instructions when Analytics settings are being resolved. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3720" rel="nofollow ugc">#3720</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.42.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update focus of Idea Hub module feature tour to highlight entire widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4076" rel="nofollow ugc">#4076</a>.</li>
<li>Add survey trigger for Idea Hub widget interactions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4052" rel="nofollow ugc">#4052</a>.</li>
<li>Add new conditional follow-up questions to user surveys. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4051" rel="nofollow ugc">#4051</a>.</li>
<li>Show Idea Hub tabs even when no ideas are available. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4013" rel="nofollow ugc">#4013</a>.</li>
<li>Use Idea Hub activities endpoint when drafting, publishing or deleting a post. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3938" rel="nofollow ugc">#3938</a>.</li>
<li>Update Idea Hub API to use v1 beta. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3916" rel="nofollow ugc">#3916</a>.</li>
<li>Update Idea Hub widget pagination to scroll to widget top on page change if out of view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3841" rel="nofollow ugc">#3841</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent feature tours from appearing during module setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3187" rel="nofollow ugc">#3187</a>.</li>
<li>Improve wording of &#8220;Invalid nonce&#8221; errors. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3098" rel="nofollow ugc">#3098</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Avoid potentially simultaneous token refresh requests by proactively refreshing soon-to-expire tokens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3477" rel="nofollow ugc">#3477</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix various JS errors due to problems with the Google Charts library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4074" rel="nofollow ugc">#4074</a>.</li>
<li>Remove leftover use of <code>helpVisibility</code> feature flag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4069" rel="nofollow ugc">#4069</a>.</li>
<li>Fix validation for Subscribe with Google publication ID so that it allows non-domain input. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4025" rel="nofollow ugc">#4025</a>.</li>
<li>Fix font problems in the Idea Hub widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4012" rel="nofollow ugc">#4012</a>.</li>
<li>Fix positioning of the Site Kit header at the breakpoint between mobile and tablet viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3986" rel="nofollow ugc">#3986</a>.</li>
<li>Update the post state for Idea Hub posts and enable it for posts of all statuses. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3909" rel="nofollow ugc">#3909</a>.</li>
<li>Use query params instead of hash URLs in Idea Hub tabs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3886" rel="nofollow ugc">#3886</a>.</li>
<li>Improve Idea Hub tab behaviour when using browser navigation. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3860" rel="nofollow ugc">#3860</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent Idea Hub tab navigation from adding to the browser&#8217;s history. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3796" rel="nofollow ugc">#3796</a>.</li>
<li>Update the Detailed Page Stats page to display AMP traffic for an AMP version of a page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3080" rel="nofollow ugc">#3080</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Analytics queries for URL lists to ignore titles for the metrics, while still showing the title for each URL. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3070" rel="nofollow ugc">#3070</a>.</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.37.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>

<li>Show information notice about associated UA / GA4 property only once a property has been selected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3614" rel="nofollow ugc">#3614</a>.</li>
<li>Update styles of controls in the GA4 notice box on the settings page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3541" rel="nofollow ugc">#3541</a>.</li>
<li>Add selected state of 300ms to user feedback survey. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3531" rel="nofollow ugc">#3531</a>.</li>
<li>Add Idea Hub setup UI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3522" rel="nofollow ugc">#3522</a>.</li>
<li>Implement Idea Hub widget functionality for saving and unsaving an idea. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3519" rel="nofollow ugc">#3519</a>.</li>
<li>Add loading indicator to the Idea Hub widget when a new draft is being created. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3387" rel="nofollow ugc">#3387</a>.</li>
<li>Allow Idea Hub CTA to be dismissed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3360" rel="nofollow ugc">#3360</a>.</li>
<li>Add the Idea Hub notification to the WordPress block editor. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3272" rel="nofollow ugc">#3272</a>.</li>
<li>Refactor settings tabs with React Router and update URL hashes with more user-friendly names. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2514" rel="nofollow ugc">#2514</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug in new React Router-based Settings Screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3707" rel="nofollow ugc">#3707</a>.</li>
<li>Fix potential <code>Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read property 'replace' of undefined</code> related to GA4 property matching logic. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3706" rel="nofollow ugc">#3706</a>.</li>
<li>Fix message for AdSense account with no data in new widget-based screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3667" rel="nofollow ugc">#3667</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug in Idea Hub where the most recent draft idea posts were not shown after creating a new draft from idea. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3660" rel="nofollow ugc">#3660</a>.</li>
<li>Add a configurable timeout to User Survey components. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3655" rel="nofollow ugc">#3655</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue with Google Charts showing negative labels in some charts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3564" rel="nofollow ugc">#3564</a>.</li>
<li>Improve User Input tag creation on Mobile Safari. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3420" rel="nofollow ugc">#3420</a>.</li>
<li>Fix global storybook padding issues. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3174" rel="nofollow ugc">#3174</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.36.0</h4>

<ul>
<li>Enhance experience for sites with UA Analytics already configured before GA4 is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3586" rel="nofollow ugc">#3586</a>.</li>

<li>Update button links to show &#8220;opens in new tab&#8221; ARIA help text, and open all User Feedback links in a new tab. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3510" rel="nofollow ugc">#3510</a>.</li>
<li>Don&#8217;t show notifications if a user survey has already been displayed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3508" rel="nofollow ugc">#3508</a>.</li>
<li>Display date range for data in the Admin Bar. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3202" rel="nofollow ugc">#3202</a>.</li>
<li>Remove the option to include/exclude logged-in users when the Analytics snippet is not placed via Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2910" rel="nofollow ugc">#2910</a>.</li>
<li>Update error message shown to AMP users when connecting Tag Manager after Analytics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2292" rel="nofollow ugc">#2292</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>

<li>Fix a bug where GA4 settings were not cleared when deactivating Analytics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3616" rel="nofollow ugc">#3616</a>.</li>

<li>Ensure account and property are preselected during setup when user has a matching GA4 property only. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3543" rel="nofollow ugc">#3543</a>.</li>

<li>Only show a GA4 creation notice once an account is selected in Analytics setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3536" rel="nofollow ugc">#3536</a>.</li>
<li>Allow posts with Idea Hub drafts to be trashed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3514" rel="nofollow ugc">#3514</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance user survey display with added animation on enter and exit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3509" rel="nofollow ugc">#3509</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug related to localized number formatting for browsers that have limited support for formatting options. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3255" rel="nofollow ugc">#3255</a>.</li>
<li>Improve table views on mobile screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3138" rel="nofollow ugc">#3138</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where AMP mode detection would not consider the AMP plugin&#8217;s template mode setting when the Web Stories plugin is active. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2998" rel="nofollow ugc">#2998</a>.</li>
</ul>

</ul>

<li>Implement a data store selector for selecting GA4 web data streams for multiple property IDs at once. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3104" rel="nofollow ugc">#3104</a>.</li>

<li>Clarify some AdSense labels and format the monetary values in top earning pages tables with the relevant currency. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/656" rel="nofollow ugc">#656</a>.</li>
<li>Update popular pages list tables on the Analytics module dashboard to be consistent with the same components on the main Site Kit and WordPress dashboards. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/98" rel="nofollow ugc">#98</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>

<li>Fix a bug that could cause the first profile to be selected in Analytics Settings when an existing tag was detected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2888" rel="nofollow ugc">#2888</a>.</li>
<li>Fix User Input Settings flow accessibility issues. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2851" rel="nofollow ugc">#2851</a>.</li>
<li>Resolved analytics URL linking issue in subfolder based installs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2821" rel="nofollow ugc">#2821</a>.</li>
<li>Redirect users from the splash screen to the dashboard if they are already authenticated. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2529" rel="nofollow ugc">#2529</a>.</li>

</ul>
<h4>1.31.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add method to get list of all base capabilities used by Site Kit. Props JoryHogeveen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3130" rel="nofollow ugc">#3130</a>.</li>
<li>Update widget header styles to use grid mechanics instead of static margins. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3119" rel="nofollow ugc">#3119</a>.</li>
<li>Implement the technical infrastructure for rendering GA4 snippets in the frontend, including support for double tagging integrating with a UA snippet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3106" rel="nofollow ugc">#3106</a>.</li>
<li>Implement REST data point and JS data store selector to look up a single GA4 property by ID. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3102" rel="nofollow ugc">#3102</a>.</li>
<li>Rename &#8220;Popularity&#8221; / &#8220;Top Queries&#8221; section to &#8220;Acquisition&#8221; for new widget-based UI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3065" rel="nofollow ugc">#3065</a>.</li>
<li>Improve styling for Site Kit header, especially on mobile devices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3058" rel="nofollow ugc">#3058</a>.</li>
<li>Update remaining external links in widgets on module pages to include correct date range parameters. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3042" rel="nofollow ugc">#3042</a>.</li>
<li>Improve speed and reliability of Analytics property matching. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3012" rel="nofollow ugc">#3012</a>.</li>
<li>Add placeholder to all &#8220;Other&#8221; text input fields in user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2993" rel="nofollow ugc">#2993</a>.</li>
<li>Implement data store selector to detect whether a GA4 property has a web data stream that matches the current site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2981" rel="nofollow ugc">#2981</a>.</li>
<li>Update the <code>modules/analytics-4</code> store with actions and selectors for creating and querying web data streams. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2980" rel="nofollow ugc">#2980</a>.</li>
<li>Implement JS data store infrastructure to query and create GA4 properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2979" rel="nofollow ugc">#2979</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce new JS asset for upcoming GA4 integration. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2977" rel="nofollow ugc">#2977</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce JS data store <code>modules/analytics-4</code> as infrastructure for upcoming GA4 integration. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2976" rel="nofollow ugc">#2976</a>.</li>
<li>Allow modifying the active Search Console property in the module&#8217;s settings panel, relevant for example when a site has multiple applicable properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2937" rel="nofollow ugc">#2937</a>.</li>
<li>Fix accessibility problem where it wasn&#8217;t possible to delete user input search terms using the keyboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2900" rel="nofollow ugc">#2900</a>.</li>
<li>Update user input styles to fix visual issues on small devices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2886" rel="nofollow ugc">#2886</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate AdSense module page &#8220;Top earning pages&#8221; widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2066" rel="nofollow ugc">#2066</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update Unique Visitors widget to display the actual number of users coming from search. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3064" rel="nofollow ugc">#3064</a>.</li>
<li>Fix visual spacing problems with widget-based dashboard due to empty containers disrupting grid layout. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3062" rel="nofollow ugc">#3062</a>.</li>
<li>Update Site Kit widgets to always return their content wrapped in a <code>Widget</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3060" rel="nofollow ugc">#3060</a>.</li>
<li>Update AdSense dashboard widgets to render ad blocker warning. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3011" rel="nofollow ugc">#3011</a>.</li>
<li>Fix broken alignment of data block elements when there is one with zero data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2992" rel="nofollow ugc">#2992</a>.</li>
<li>Fix UI issues on the pie chart of the All Traffic widget when there is just a single slice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2991" rel="nofollow ugc">#2991</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Analytics links in new widgets on the Analytics module page to take into account selected days. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2983" rel="nofollow ugc">#2983</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug where select menu components could be partially covered by the Site Kit header making some items unclickable. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2885" rel="nofollow ugc">#2885</a>.</li>
<li>Improve performance of potentially slow database query to migrate user data from an older version of Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2870" rel="nofollow ugc">#2870</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue with AdSense existing site detection when using camelcase URLs in WordPress settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2695" rel="nofollow ugc">#2695</a>.</li>
<li>Fix javascript issues that appear when admin pages have been translated with Google Translate. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2280" rel="nofollow ugc">#2280</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.30.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add tracking events for help visibility menu links. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3027" rel="nofollow ugc">#3027</a>.</li>
<li>Scaffold <code>analytics-4</code> module PHP class. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2974" rel="nofollow ugc">#2974</a>.</li>
<li>Clarify wording of warning message when disabling the AdSense snippet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2962" rel="nofollow ugc">#2962</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce hidden labels for search term fields of the User Input Settings flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2901" rel="nofollow ugc">#2901</a>.</li>
<li>Fix low-contrast color for keyword bubbles in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2896" rel="nofollow ugc">#2896</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that the user is not sent to the user input flow when granting additional scopes after being already authenticated, even if submitting the user input response is still required. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2874" rel="nofollow ugc">#2874</a>.</li>
<li>Update assets across the plugin with new side kick-based branding illustrations. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2616" rel="nofollow ugc">#2616</a>.</li>
<li>Include button to reset Site Kit under &#8220;Available Tools&#8221; in WordPress, as a way to reset the plugin data e.g. when currently not being connected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2384" rel="nofollow ugc">#2384</a>.</li>
<li>Update modules settings to use separate components for active and inactive modules. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2184" rel="nofollow ugc">#2184</a>.</li>
<li>Improve the pre-setup compatibility checks to properly warn if the REST API is disabled instead of failing with an unexpected error. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2101" rel="nofollow ugc">#2101</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Analytics module page Top Acquisition Channels widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2069" rel="nofollow ugc">#2069</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Analytics module page popular pages widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2068" rel="nofollow ugc">#2068</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Analytics module page overview widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2067" rel="nofollow ugc">#2067</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate AdSense module page overview widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2065" rel="nofollow ugc">#2065</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Search Console module page popular keywords widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2064" rel="nofollow ugc">#2064</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Search Console module page overview widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2063" rel="nofollow ugc">#2063</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix critical JS error due to a new version of the Google charts library being released, by locking to a specific version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3132" rel="nofollow ugc">#3132</a>.</li>
<li>Fix regression where modules may be sorted incorrectly on the plugin&#8217;s settings screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3093" rel="nofollow ugc">#3093</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug with help visibility icon in header where clicking it wouldn&#8217;t trigger the menu to open in some scenarios, and also address some visual design problems with it. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3026" rel="nofollow ugc">#3026</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Ad Blocker detection issue which occurred on sites with GoDaddy CDN enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3018" rel="nofollow ugc">#3018</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure changing the site URL between HTTP and HTTPS or <code>www.</code> and non-<code>www.</code> does not impact the results displayed in Analytics and AdSense widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3005" rel="nofollow ugc">#3005</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where Analytics snippet could still be placed when an existing snippet was already present in the frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2909" rel="nofollow ugc">#2909</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that the AdSense snippet is not included on 404 pages in the frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2784" rel="nofollow ugc">#2784</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.29.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Only show notice about a user input question affecting other users of the site if there is more than one authorized user on the site overall. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2852" rel="nofollow ugc">#2852</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce new contextual help menu in Site Kit header bar and on the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2846" rel="nofollow ugc">#2846</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce tooltip tour guiding the user through the new version of the All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2739" rel="nofollow ugc">#2739</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance <code>PreviewBlock</code> JS component to support breakpoint-specific sizes via props. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2727" rel="nofollow ugc">#2727</a>.</li>
<li>Implement persistent dismissal of feature tours, stored in the database. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2650" rel="nofollow ugc">#2650</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>ReportTable</code> component for displaying reusable data tables. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2249" rel="nofollow ugc">#2249</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix vertical axis labels for Session Duration graph on Search Console module page to not mix minutes and hours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2967" rel="nofollow ugc">#2967</a>.</li>
<li>Fix problem where OAuth callback login would be triggered before WordPress&#8217;s login redirect mechanism, immediately failing instead of redirecting as expected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2935" rel="nofollow ugc">#2935</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure entering a text is required when choosing the &#8220;Other&#8221; option for a question in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2907" rel="nofollow ugc">#2907</a>.</li>
<li>Fix refactored Analytics goals widget behavior to match legacy version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2858" rel="nofollow ugc">#2858</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where switching between questions in the user input flow did not scroll the question into view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2848" rel="nofollow ugc">#2848</a>.</li>
<li>Cache user input responses temporarily in browser until it is submitted while the user is going through the flow, to prevent accidentally losing entered data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2844" rel="nofollow ugc">#2844</a>.</li>
<li>Clarify wording in last user input question about search terms. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2843" rel="nofollow ugc">#2843</a>.</li>
<li>Fix some bugs in the behavior when checking or unchecking an &#8220;Other&#8221; option for one of the questions in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2828" rel="nofollow ugc">#2828</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.28.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Implement React components for rendering tooltip tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2626" rel="nofollow ugc">#2626</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Automatically focus the &#8220;Other&#8221; text input upon selecting the &#8220;Other&#8221; option in a list of radio buttons or checkboxes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2897" rel="nofollow ugc">#2897</a>.</li>
<li>Update copy to clarify multiple choice behavior in user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2857" rel="nofollow ugc">#2857</a>.</li>
<li>Update links on new version of AdSense dashboard summary widget to deep link to the respective area in the AdSense frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2774" rel="nofollow ugc">#2774</a>.</li>
<li>Include site URL in AdSense report deep links to point to the appropriate report. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2773" rel="nofollow ugc">#2773</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for PHP 8 and ensure its maintenance via CI. Props TorbenLundsgaard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2724" rel="nofollow ugc">#2724</a>.</li>
<li>The <code>googlesitekit_authorize_user</code> and <code>googlesitekit_reauthorize_user</code> actions are now also fired when not using the authentication service flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2693" rel="nofollow ugc">#2693</a>.</li>
<li>Implement infrastructure for rendering widgets in Site Kit module screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2653" rel="nofollow ugc">#2653</a>.</li>
<li>Use reliable and React-friendly approach for detecting whether a widget is inactive and should not be rendered. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2612" rel="nofollow ugc">#2612</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance localization of duration formatting. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2588" rel="nofollow ugc">#2588</a>.</li>
<li>Filter all Analytics API requests to only include results for the current domain. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2554" rel="nofollow ugc">#2554</a>.</li>
<li>Rely exclusively on SVGs for graphics and remove other image support. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2468" rel="nofollow ugc">#2468</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improve UX around entering search terms in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2842" rel="nofollow ugc">#2842</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various visual glitches in the user input flow summary view and trim free text content entered for any &#8220;Other&#8221; choice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2837" rel="nofollow ugc">#2837</a>.</li>
<li>Change to preview / next button behaviour in User Input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2829" rel="nofollow ugc">#2829</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AdSense bug where <code>Ad Client not found</code> error would be displayed in certain cases where an account is still pending. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2812" rel="nofollow ugc">#2812</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where AdGuard and uBlock ad blockers were no longer being recognized by Site Kit by implementing a more holistic solution for ad blocker detection relying on the <code>just-detect-adblock</code> library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2794" rel="nofollow ugc">#2794</a>.</li>
<li>Update link on AdSense module page to point to Analytics which is more accurate due to the source of the data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2772" rel="nofollow ugc">#2772</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Search Console x-axis labels on 90 day charts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2747" rel="nofollow ugc">#2747</a>.</li>
