<li>Fix bug where single post stats would display the unique visitors from Search for the overall site instead of only that post. Props phamquangbaoplus. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1371" rel="nofollow ugc">#1371</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Analytics incorrectly triggering re-authentication notice when the user does not have any accounts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1368" rel="nofollow ugc">#1368</a>.</li>
<li>Fix JS datastore actions to never have an associated control and reducer at the same time. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1361" rel="nofollow ugc">#1361</a>.</li>
<li>Place Tag Manager snippet for non-JavaScript support after opening <code>body</code> tag as commonly expected. Props ShahAaron. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1308" rel="nofollow ugc">#1308</a>.</li>
<li>Fix layout issue in Tag Manager settings panel when no container is selected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1296" rel="nofollow ugc">#1296</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue related to added <code>_gl</code> query parameter from AMP linker. Props ShahAaron. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1275" rel="nofollow ugc">#1275</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.7.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Allow modules to register and enqueue their own assets by implementing a <code>Module_With_Assets</code> interface. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1319" rel="nofollow ugc">#1319</a>.</li>
<li>Decouple datastores from global registry by using <code>createRegistryControl</code> and <code>createRegistrySelector</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1287" rel="nofollow ugc">#1287</a>.</li>
<li>Update datastore resolvers to only issue API requests when lacking data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1286" rel="nofollow ugc">#1286</a>.</li>
<li>Add preloading middleware for REST API data and preload module settings routes on pageload. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1246" rel="nofollow ugc">#1246</a>.</li>
<li>Add more granular selectors to the <code>core/site</code> datastore. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1173" rel="nofollow ugc">#1173</a>.</li>
<li>Add several additional selectors for commonly used site data to the <code>core/site</code> datastore. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1000" rel="nofollow ugc">#1000</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug where plugins modifying the site address during frontend requests would prevent the setup flow from being completed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1357" rel="nofollow ugc">#1357</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where <code>googlesitekit.api.set</code> would not pass through request data correctly to the API endpoints. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1346" rel="nofollow ugc">#1346</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where using a WordPress locale with a third segment (e.g. formal variant) would cause JavaScript errors on some screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1309" rel="nofollow ugc">#1309</a>.</li>
<li>Do not revoke token remotely when token is deleted, unless explicitly requested via disconnect. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1305" rel="nofollow ugc">#1305</a>.</li>
<li>Fix unicode domains being displayed in punycode version in disconnect feedback message. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1297" rel="nofollow ugc">#1297</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where certain numbers were rounded differently from how the respective Google service rounds them. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1279" rel="nofollow ugc">#1279</a>.</li>
<li>Optimize JavaScript dependency loading, decreasing the chance of conflicts and reducing the plugin size. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1222" rel="nofollow ugc">#1222</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure the total user count in the Analytics module matches the numbers displayed in the Google Analytics frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1202" rel="nofollow ugc">#1202</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add support for reading and editing settings to datastores created via <code>googlesitekit.modules.createModuleStore</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1249" rel="nofollow ugc">#1249</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>googlesitekit-modules</code> asset with <code>createModuleStore</code> function to create a base datastore for a Site Kit module. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1063" rel="nofollow ugc">#1063</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure module settings are consistently passed from PHP to JavaScript, and fix some minor logic issues in the consuming JavaScript code. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1245" rel="nofollow ugc">#1245</a>.</li>
<li>Automatically include a REST route to read and edit settings for every module that supports them. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1244" rel="nofollow ugc">#1244</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix issue where users would get stuck on setup screen after seemingly successful completion of the setup flow on the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1266" rel="nofollow ugc">#1266</a>.</li>
<li>Provide clear error message informing the user when they did not grant the necessary permissions, instead of a generic <code>access_denied</code> error code. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1192" rel="nofollow ugc">#1192</a>.</li>
<li>Fix JavaScript errors in AdSense screens that was a result of <code>Intl.NumberFormat.formatToParts</code> not being supported in Safari. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1107" rel="nofollow ugc">#1107</a>.</li>
<li>Fix JavaScript error <code>e.replace is not a function</code> in AdSense screens related to formatting numbers. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1092" rel="nofollow ugc">#1092</a>.</li>
<li>Fix problems around comparing domains with unicode characters that could result in blocking the plugin setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/794" rel="nofollow ugc">#794</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.5.1</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure tracking opt-out mechanism works consistently between both Analytics and Tag Manager in AMP, and fix regression with Site Kit admin bar menu no longer expanding on AMP pages. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1251" rel="nofollow ugc">#1251</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.5.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Expose <code>googlesitekit.data</code> registry and register initial <code>core/site</code> store on it. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/999" rel="nofollow ugc">#999</a>.</li>
<li>Add user-facing warnings to Site Kit areas when JavaScript is disabled. Props Shavindra. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/177" rel="nofollow ugc">#177</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Standardize several REST API route names for consistency with JavaScript API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1178" rel="nofollow ugc">#1178</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various plugin setup issues related to inconsistent URLs by automatically updating registered URIs on the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1034" rel="nofollow ugc">#1034</a>.</li>
<li>Improve asset handling in PHP by introducing dedicated data-only scripts, to use as dependencies. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1004" rel="nofollow ugc">#1004</a>.</li>
<li>Respect Analytics tracking exclusion of logged-in WordPress users also if Tag Manager is used. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/944" rel="nofollow ugc">#944</a>.</li>
<li>Integrate with WordPress Site Health feature to provide contextual Site Kit information for support and troubleshooting. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/169" rel="nofollow ugc">#169</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Display helpful link in previously empty PageSpeed Insights settings area. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1129" rel="nofollow ugc">#1129</a>.</li>
<li>Use latest product icon for the Optimize module. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/969" rel="nofollow ugc">#969</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure date range selectors functionality is decoupled from localizable strings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1183" rel="nofollow ugc">#1183</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bugs where some untranslated strings would show despite being translated, caused by too early usage of these strings in JavaScript. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1163" rel="nofollow ugc">#1163</a>.</li>
<li>Replace outdated AMP client ID mechanism for tracking AMP traffic with recommended AMP linker approach, and enable it by default. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1160" rel="nofollow ugc">#1160</a>.</li>
<li>Fix compatibility error where <code>google.charts.load</code> was not called before <code>google.charts.setOnLoadCallback</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1155" rel="nofollow ugc">#1155</a>.</li>
<li>Do not show empty data table in Analytics module screen when there is no data to display. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/464" rel="nofollow ugc">#464</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.4.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce basic notifications system for information displayed in the Site Kit dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1110" rel="nofollow ugc">#1110</a>.</li>
<li>Register all of the plugin&#8217;s user options in WordPress via <code>register_meta()</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1029" rel="nofollow ugc">#1029</a>.</li>
<li>Improve JS error handling consistently across individual React apps and allow for better contextualization. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/943" rel="nofollow ugc">#943</a>.</li>
<li>Display information about lack of data instead of displaying empty top search queries box. Props Shavindra. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/314" rel="nofollow ugc">#314</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure admin bar displays when at least Search Console or Analytics have stats for the current URL. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/167" rel="nofollow ugc">#167</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix minor bug causing potentially incorrect token expiry to be recorded. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1158" rel="nofollow ugc">#1158</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AMP violations when user is logged in and Site Kit admin bar menu is active. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1142" rel="nofollow ugc">#1142</a>.</li>
<li>Fix incompatibility issue with Jetpack by resolving bug where the bundled <code>lodash</code> was causing a conflict. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1141" rel="nofollow ugc">#1141</a>.</li>
<li>Fix double-rendered HTML markup on Site Kit dashboard screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1140" rel="nofollow ugc">#1140</a>.</li>
<li>Fix misleading sparkline color for metrics that should use the inverted color, such as bounce rate. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1128" rel="nofollow ugc">#1128</a>.</li>
<li>Work around <a href="https://github.com/SpiderLabs/owasp-modsecurity-crs/issues/1451" rel="nofollow ugc">bug in ModSecurity</a> by relying on only providing granted OAuth scopes in token API response. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1113" rel="nofollow ugc">#1113</a>.</li>
<li>Make JS and CSS asset names consistent. Props Shavindra. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1040" rel="nofollow ugc">#1040</a>.</li>
<li>Properly support paired AMP in Tag Manager module by allowing to select two different containers, one for <code>web</code> context and the other for <code>amp</code> context. Props kmwilkerson. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/413" rel="nofollow ugc">#413</a>.</li>
<li>Fix accessibility issues in dialog component with potentially duplicate IDs and invalid ARIA attributes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/345" rel="nofollow ugc">#345</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue where disconnecting a user from a site would disconnect that user from all their sites.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.1</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure <code>opcache_reset()</code> exists before calling it. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1136" rel="nofollow ugc">#1136</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.3.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce <code>googlesitekit.data</code> registry for JS datastores. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/997" rel="nofollow ugc">#997</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>No longer delete plugin data when uninstalling and instead rely on the more explicit reset functionality. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1069" rel="nofollow ugc">#1069</a>.</li>
<li>Remove legacy migrations that were only relevant to pre-1.0.0 users. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1062" rel="nofollow ugc">#1062</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate stray module settings into object-like option for consistency and future scalability. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1030" rel="nofollow ugc">#1030</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>core/site/data/connection</code> REST API route for retrieving site connection info. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/998" rel="nofollow ugc">#998</a>.</li>
<li>Fully rely on Webpack for third-party dependencies and decouple from WordPress-shipped assets for more stability across all versions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/993" rel="nofollow ugc">#993</a>.</li>
<li>Inform the site owner about potential issues with their site that will likely cause problems when setting up the plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/933" rel="nofollow ugc">#933</a>.</li>
<li>Make opting in to tracking specific per user instead of per site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/913" rel="nofollow ugc">#913</a>.</li>
<li>Bump minimum required PHP version to 5.6, rely on up-to-date linting tools and fix various PHPCS issues. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/547" rel="nofollow ugc">#547</a>.</li>
<li>Move REST route definitions into more applicable classes that handle the respective functionality. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/166" rel="nofollow ugc">#166</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Allow users with existing Tag Manager accounts to create additional accounts during module setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1080" rel="nofollow ugc">#1080</a>.</li>
<li>Fix partly outdated PHP files being served due to OpCache issues <a href="https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/36455" rel="nofollow ugc">currently not addressed by WordPress core</a>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1066" rel="nofollow ugc">#1066</a>.</li>
<li>Prevent unexpected PageSpeed Insights API responses from breaking the dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1061" rel="nofollow ugc">#1061</a>.</li>
<li>Standardize GA tracking snippets and inconsistent data passed in events by introducing a proper tracking API in JavaScript. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1055" rel="nofollow ugc">#1055</a>.</li>
<li>Fix several temporary blank screen errors by loading script dependencies more reliably via Webpack. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1054" rel="nofollow ugc">#1054</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that the Tag Manager snippet rendered is always compatible with the current context (AMP vs non-AMP). See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1036" rel="nofollow ugc">#1036</a>.</li>
<li>Do not render <code>amp-auto-ads</code> element in AMP stories because it is invalid in that context. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/979" rel="nofollow ugc">#979</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that Google Charts JS library is loaded as expected even when a <code>window.google</code> global already exists because of another library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/939" rel="nofollow ugc">#939</a>.</li>
<li>Do not refetch PageSpeed Insights data when the date range selector is changed, as its data its date-unaware. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/890" rel="nofollow ugc">#890</a>.</li>
<li>Fix incorrect change arrow direction and color on &#8220;inverted&#8221; properties like bounce rate. Props WebFactoryLtd. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/481" rel="nofollow ugc">#481</a>.</li>
<li>Add missing support for Search Console domain properties and rely on the correct property when requesting Search Console data. Props IgorCode. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/325" rel="nofollow ugc">#325</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.2.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce new <code>googlesitekit.api</code> layer for accessing Site Kit datapoints with reliable caching. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/953" rel="nofollow ugc">#953</a>.</li>
<li>Detect already existing Tag Manager snippets from other sources and inform about them in the setup flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/433" rel="nofollow ugc">#433</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce Site Kit-specific <code>Google_Client</code> implementation and use that throughout the codebase. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1003" rel="nofollow ugc">#1003</a>.</li>
<li>Reduce maintenance by implementing dynamic activation notice in React. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/991" rel="nofollow ugc">#991</a>.</li>
<li>Include platform and plugin version information in API client requests. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/989" rel="nofollow ugc">#989</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that all module settings are properly registered in WordPress for consistent behavior. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/859" rel="nofollow ugc">#859</a>.</li>
<li>Allow users to rely on <code>WP_PROXY_*</code> constants to use an HTTP proxy for requests issued by <code>Google_Client</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/661" rel="nofollow ugc">#661</a>.</li>
<li>Allow users that have existing Google Analytics account to create a new account in module setup and settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/198" rel="nofollow ugc">#198</a>.</li>
<li>Remove very limited debug bar integration for now. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/178" rel="nofollow ugc">#178</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug and potential JavaScript error where user was able to select Analytics property before selecting an account. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1039" rel="nofollow ugc">#1039</a>.</li>
<li>Optimize initialization of the Google API client and minimize JavaScript assets and inline data being loaded in regular requests. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/980" rel="nofollow ugc">#980</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Search Console average position graph to show the smallest value on top of the Y axis. Props connorhsm. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/874" rel="nofollow ugc">#874</a>.</li>
<li>Display warnings about insufficient scopes across all Site Kit screens instead of only the dashboard, since they are just as relevant during setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/729" rel="nofollow ugc">#729</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that PageSpeed Insights module can be deactivated again once activated. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/682" rel="nofollow ugc">#682</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.4</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improve compatibility with WordPress VIP environment. Props moraleida. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/901" rel="nofollow ugc">#901</a>.</li>
<li>Update wording on setup screen for secondary users to clarify they need to connect their account, but not set up the plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/881" rel="nofollow ugc">#881</a>.</li>
<li>Use OAuth <code>login_hint</code> parameter to indicate that the user should use the same Google account across all modules. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/867" rel="nofollow ugc">#867</a>.</li>
<li>Anonymize IP addresses by default in Google Analytics snippet, and grant the user control to modify with a new setting. Props gx10. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/18" rel="nofollow ugc">#18</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix compatibility issues with older versions of the AMP plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/975" rel="nofollow ugc">#975</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that only options and user options starting with <code>googlesitekit_</code> (including underscore) are deleted on reset or disconnect. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/968" rel="nofollow ugc">#968</a>.</li>
<li>Optimize disconnecting users by only running a single database query. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/960" rel="nofollow ugc">#960</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure Site Kit admin bar content is styled independently from the current theme. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/888" rel="nofollow ugc">#888</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug in Analytics module setup where the user would not be informed about an existing tag before selecting a property. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/803" rel="nofollow ugc">#803</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where admin bar stats would not display under certain circumstances when editing a post in the backend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/521" rel="nofollow ugc">#521</a>.</li>
<li>Display impressions before clicks in admin bar as that is the commonly expected order. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/297" rel="nofollow ugc">#297</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.3</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix critical AdSense issue where users were not able to place the snippet and would end up on a blank screen under certain conditions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/891" rel="nofollow ugc">#891</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.2</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce new mechanism for a site to receive its credentials from the authentication service, replacing the previous mechanism using the REST API that was error-prone on certain environments. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/905" rel="nofollow ugc">#905</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Remove unnecessary logic to refresh an access token on login, since the Google API client already accounts for that. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/903" rel="nofollow ugc">#903</a>.</li>
<li>Fix too long request URLs for Google API batch requests to use <code>POST</code> instead, as the query length was problematic on certain environments. Props sksaju. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/779" rel="nofollow ugc">#779</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug resulting in blank plugin dashboard screen under certain circumstances. Props ThomasTr. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/767" rel="nofollow ugc">#767</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that opting in or out of tracking takes effect immediately. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/727" rel="nofollow ugc">#727</a>.</li>
<li>Fix spacing issue in Search Console step for local development setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/637" rel="nofollow ugc">#637</a>.</li>
<li>Fix display of the disconnect modal which could potentially appear below the &#8220;section locked&#8221; indicator in the plugin settings UI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/636" rel="nofollow ugc">#636</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.1</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix reset and uninstall data removal by optimizing database queries. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/809" rel="nofollow ugc">#809</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update usage of G icon in admin menu, dashboard widget and screen options to align better with WordPress admin UI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/877" rel="nofollow ugc">#877</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for site verification via file as primary method while keeping site verification via meta tag as fallback, resolving potential site verification failures. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/836" rel="nofollow ugc">#836</a>.</li>
<li>Move checkbox above submit button in setup screen and banner for better accessibility. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/788" rel="nofollow ugc">#788</a>.</li>
<li>Use more secure nonce generation mechanism for the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/756" rel="nofollow ugc">#756</a>.</li>
<li>Show PageSpeed Insights performance stats for every individual URL in its details view, accessible from Site Kit dashboard and admin bar. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/654" rel="nofollow ugc">#654</a>.</li>
<li>Display Tag Manager container names instead of IDs in dropdowns for more user-friendly selection. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/591" rel="nofollow ugc">#591</a>.</li>
<li>Remove redundant notification title for AdSense notifications. Props OisinOConnor. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/586" rel="nofollow ugc">#586</a>.</li>
<li>Always use root domain for AdSense site because subdomains are typically not supported. Props OisinOConnor. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/578" rel="nofollow ugc">#578</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for displaying the full Site Kit admin bar menu with stats also for AMP requests, by leveraging AMP&#8217;s dev mode feature. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/438" rel="nofollow ugc">#438</a>.</li>
<li>Simplify AdSense account status detection as a base for easier future enhancements and fixes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/427" rel="nofollow ugc">#427</a>.</li>
<li>Add a checkbox to allow disabling Analytics tracking for logged-in users, and introduce a filter to adjust the behavior programmatically. Props Paras16699. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/88" rel="nofollow ugc">#88</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure that a newly created Tag Manager container is properly saved so that the module setup is completed. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/821" rel="nofollow ugc">#821</a>.</li>
<li>Improve detection of existing AdSense snippets to cover more variants of snippets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/798" rel="nofollow ugc">#798</a>.</li>
<li>Only display the Reset button on the setup screen if there actually is something to reset, and provide a feedback notice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/758" rel="nofollow ugc">#758</a>.</li>
<li>Update incorrect message in development setup flow referring to site verification instead of Search Console. Props AVGP. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/600" rel="nofollow ugc">#600</a>.</li>
<li>Only show Tag Manager containers that are relevant to the site&#8217;s mode, and accordingly support AMP-first by only exposing AMP containers. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/470" rel="nofollow ugc">#470</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.4</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix critical bug causing unnecessary requests to Google People API although no user is logged-in. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/854" rel="nofollow ugc">#854</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.3</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix critical issue where an invalid refresh token would not revoke the current token, resulting in recurring requests with further attempts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/831" rel="nofollow ugc">#831</a>.</li>
<li>Fix REST request sending credentials potentially being blocked due to user agent.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.2</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Introduce Jest for JS unit tests, migrate existing tests, and improve various related infrastructure components. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/524" rel="nofollow ugc">#524</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Do not disconnect user when refreshing an access token randomly fails, and ensure the user sees an error message about any errors during the process. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/818" rel="nofollow ugc">#818</a>.</li>
<li>Fix error that could occur when setting up a new Analytics profile from the module setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/816" rel="nofollow ugc">#816</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where the site verification nonce was not sent to the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/797" rel="nofollow ugc">#797</a>.</li>
<li>Fix false positive when detecting existing Analytics tags, which previously blocked users from completing the module setup. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/793" rel="nofollow ugc">#793</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that <code>google-site-kit</code> translation strings in JavaScript files are maintained after minification so that they can be translated on wordpress.org. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/782" rel="nofollow ugc">#782</a>.</li>
<li>Improve various translation strings by removing trailing spaces, adding a context, fixing capitalization, and more. Props pedro-mendonca. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/769" rel="nofollow ugc">#769</a>.</li>
<li>Remove irrelevant translation strings from codebase by eliminating <code>@wordpress/components</code> dependency. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/759" rel="nofollow ugc">#759</a>.</li>
<li>Improve detection of existing Analytics snippet by covering a further variant that is used e.g. by the Analytify plugin. Props ernee. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/744" rel="nofollow ugc">#744</a>.</li>
<li>Improve UX and fix performance issues with excessive re-rendering in the module settings screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/742" rel="nofollow ugc">#742</a>.</li>
<li>Fix style issues in various data tables which previously would break out of their parent containers on certain device widths. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/480" rel="nofollow ugc">#480</a>.</li>
<li>Fix <code>Unknown error (code: checking requirements failed).</code> by resolving quota issues on the authentication service.</li>
<li>Improve stability of REST API request issued by the authentication service when setting up a new site.</li>
<li>Fix <code>Method not allowed</code> error on the authentication service.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.1</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure verification tokens and other plugin user data correctly get cleared when resetting the plugin before the user has authenticated. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/771" rel="nofollow ugc">#771</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where the verification tag sent from the service to the plugin would result in a 404 response, preventing the verification from being completed. Props theeducatedbarfly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/765" rel="nofollow ugc">#765</a>.</li>
<li>Improve compatibility with sites that have a <code>http://</code> website address stored as <code>home_url</code>, but actually require HTTPS. Props drcrow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/760" rel="nofollow ugc">#760</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Display a reset button alongside the setup button so that the plugin can also be reset before completing the initial flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/753" rel="nofollow ugc">#753</a>.</li>
<li>Remove custom updater to instead fully rely on wordpress.org. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/644" rel="nofollow ugc">#644</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Correctly disconnect the user when revoking access from the proxy, and update the wording accordingly. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/724" rel="nofollow ugc">#724</a>.</li>
<li>Show error message in PageSpeed Insights widget when API response incorrectly comes back with a score of 0. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/723" rel="nofollow ugc">#723</a>.</li>
</ul>

<h4>THE #1 WEB CREATION PLATFORM, POWERING OVER 10M WEBSITES WORLDWIDE.</h4>
<p>Elementor is the leading website building platform for WordPress, enabling web creators to build professional, pixel-perfect websites with an intuitive visual builder. Quickly create amazing websites for your clients or your business with complete control over every piece, without writing a single line of code. Join a vast community of web creators from all around the world who deliver exceptional websites using Elementor.</p>
<p><a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-homepage-check-out-elementor-website-builder/" rel="nofollow ugc">Check out Elementor Website Builder</a>.</p>
<h4>ONE PLATFORM, UNLIMITED WEB CREATIONS</h4>
<p>Whether you’re looking to achieve pixel-perfect designs, scale and accelerate your website creation process, or increase lead generation, Elementor has what you need to create any type of website.</p>
<p>With an instant, live design and inline editing drag-and-drop Editor, you can create your website while seeing exactly how it would look. Elementor’s open-source solution comes with dozens of out-of-the-box widgets and features for you to use. Additionally,  you can integrate with other marketing services or extend Elementor’s capabilities even more with the <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-developers-developers-docs/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Docs</a>.</p>
<p>To edit elements from your Theme, including its Header, Footer, Single Post, and Archive Page, check out our <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-elementor-pro-pro-features/" rel="nofollow ugc">Pro features</a>.</p>
<h4>PIXEL-PERFECT DESIGNS</h4>
<p>With Elementor’s robust design features, you can create unique, show-stopping websites. Adjust every element&#8217;s spacing, positioning, padding, and margins exactly as you want it, down to the very last pixel. Elevate your website’s design with over 40 widgets and features like Box Shadow, Background Overlays, Hover Effects, Headline Effects, Animations, Gradient Backgrounds, CSS Transform, Mask Options, Shape Dividers, Coming Soon Mode, and many more.</p>
<p>To view a complete list of Elementor’s features, visit the <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-pro-features-feature-page/" rel="nofollow ugc">feature page</a>.</p>
<h4>FULL WEBSITE KITS AND TEMPLATE LIBRARY</h4>
<p>Save valuable time, jumpstart your website creation process, or find inspiration with our designer-made website kits and templates. Apply a <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-library-full-website-kit/" rel="nofollow ugc">Full Website Kit</a> to get a website in a snap, including the Homepage, Service Page, and more. Use the library to import Single Pages, Blocks, or Popup templates to your website. You can also create and export your own templates and import them to another website to create reusable website blueprints and accelerate your website creation process.</p>
<h4>FULLY RESPONSIVE</h4>
<p>Seamlessly adjust the content and presentation of your website to every device. With <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-pro-features-custom-breakpoints/" rel="nofollow ugc">Custom Breakpoints</a>, you can deliver the most optimized experience for each visitor, whether they’re viewing your website on Desktop, Mobile, Tablet, Wide Screen, and more.</p>
<h4>ACCELERATED CREATION WORKFLOW</h4>
<p>Streamline your workflow and introduce efficient methodologies to accelerate your website creation process. Leverage global fonts and colors for consistency throughout your website. Drag media files directly from your desktop into the editor, mark widgets as favorites, create a blueprint of your website so you can reuse it, and more.</p>
<p>Take your professional workflow to the next level with <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-pro-features-dynamic-content/" rel="nofollow ugc">Dynamic Content</a>.</p>
<h4>FAST LOADING WEBSITES</h4>
<p>Enjoy fast-loading websites that rank well on Google search. Enhance your website performance using built-in features, and benefit from Elementor&#8217;s ongoing performance improvements, such as reduced CSS and JS files, lazy loading, and more. To learn more, check out our <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-performance-performance-page/" rel="nofollow ugc">performance page</a>.</p>
<h4>PROMOTING ACCESSIBILITY</h4>
<p>Elementor is built with Accessibility in mind and offers tools and enhancements to help you provide a better experience for all users. These include HTML 5 semantic, full keyboard navigation menu, ongoing accessibility improvement of features, widget, and more</p>
<h4>SUPPORTED BY A STRONG COMMUNITY</h4>
<p>Join a thriving global community that helps each other achieve their goals. Get answers to your questions, solve problems with other members, share knowledge, and so much more. Join the community discussions, meetups, enjoy hundreds of YouTube videos, articles, and tutorials made by members worldwide.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-facebook-group/" rel="nofollow ugc">Facebook Community</a> &#8211; with over 120K members, who are constantly offering support, advice, feedback, and tutorials about new features and how to achieve complex website scenarios.</li>
<li><a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-addons-dozens-of-elementor-addons/" rel="nofollow ugc">Dozens of Elementor</a> Addons &#8211; a multitude of addons that extends Elementor’s solution with over 900 addons, so you can achieve nearly every capability you can think of, no matter how niche it is.</li>
<li><a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-experts-experts-community/" rel="nofollow ugc">Experts Community</a> &#8211; the Elementor experts market is the place for you to find and hire an Expert, or become an Expert and offer your services to clients.</li>
<li><a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-community-hub-community-hub/" rel="nofollow ugc">Community Hub</a> &#8211; connect with other community members, get informed about new releases and updates in the developer&#8217;s edition.</li>
<li><a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-github-repo/" rel="nofollow ugc">Github Community</a> &#8211; get information about all the latest releases, request features, or report a bug.</li>
</ul>
<h4>OVER 40+ FREE WIDGETS AND COUNTING</h4>
<p>Elementor includes a variety of 40+ free widgets for you to build professional and engaging websites:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Heading</strong>. Add eye-catching headlines.</li>
<li><strong>Image</strong>. Control the size, opacity and other settings of images.</li>
<li><strong>Text Editor</strong>. A WYSIWYG text editor, just like the WordPress editor.</li>
<li><strong>Video</strong>. Add YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion or self-hosted videos to your page.</li>
<li><strong>Button</strong>. Controlling every aspect of the button design.</li>
<li><strong>Image Box</strong>. A box that includes image, headline and text.</li>
<li><strong>Testimonials</strong>. Customer testimonials that show social proof.</li>
<li><strong>Icon</strong>. Place one or more of 600+ icons available.</li>
<li><strong>Icon Box</strong>. Include an icon, headline, and text with one widget.</li>
<li><strong>Social Icons</strong>. Link to your social pages with the relevant icon like Facebook/Twitter.</li>
<li><strong>Image Gallery</strong>. Displays your images in an aligned grid.</li>
<li><strong>Image Carousel</strong>. Create a rotating carousel or slider for chosen images.</li>
<li><strong>Icon List</strong>. Use any icon to create a bullet list.</li>
<li><strong>Counter</strong>. Show stats and numbers in an escalating manner.</li>
<li><strong>Progress Bar</strong>. Include an escalating progress bar.</li>
<li><strong>Tabs</strong>. Display different pieces of content in vertical or horizontal tabs.</li>
<li><strong>Accordion</strong>. Display content in multiple collapsable sections.</li>
<li><strong>Toggle</strong>. Use the Toggle to hide or display content, like FAQ.</li>
<li><strong>Star Rating</strong>. Allow your visitors to rate you on your website.</li>
<li><strong>Alert</strong>. Include a colored alert box to draw visitor’s attention.</li>
<li><strong>HTML</strong>. Insert code into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Shortcode</strong>. Easily insert shortcodes from any plugin into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Menu Anchor</strong>. Link any menu to this anchor.</li>
<li><strong>Read More</strong>. Set the <code>Read More</code> cut-off for the excerpt in archive pages.</li>
<li><strong>Sidebar</strong>. Add any sidebar into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Google Maps</strong>. Embed maps into the page.</li>
<li><strong>SoundCloud</strong>. Add audio bits from SoundCloud.</li>
<li><strong>Divider</strong>. Separate content with a designed divider.</li>
<li><strong>Spacer</strong>. Add space between elements.</li>
<li><strong>Columns</strong>. Create inner columns within the column.</li>
<li><strong>Text Path</strong>. Attach your text to a path..</li>
<li><strong>And counting&#8230;</strong></li>
</ul>
<h4>Developer API</h4>
<p>As an open-source platform, developers can extend Elementor’s capabilities and explore various resources to get started. This includes a <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-developers-developers-website/" rel="nofollow ugc">developer&#8217;s website</a>, <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-developers-developers-docs-2/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Docs</a>, <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-developers-developers-blog/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog</a>, <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-github-repo/" rel="nofollow ugc">GitHub</a>, <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-newsletter-addon-newsletter/" rel="nofollow ugc">Add-on Developers Newsletter</a>, the <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-community-hub-community-hubs-development-room/" rel="nofollow ugc">Community Hub’s development room</a>, and more.</p>
<h4>TRANSLATED TO 59+ LANGUAGES, INCLUDES RTL SUPPORT</h4>
<p>Elementor supports multiple languages and typographies and is RTL compatible, so you get an Editor and Panel that supports <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-wordpress-plugin-translate/" rel="nofollow ugc">over 59 languages</a> out of the box. Elementor is also compatible with WPML, Polylang, TranslatePress, Weglot, and more.<br />
If you would like to contribute, you can add a new language via translate.wordpress.org. We’ve built a short guide explaining <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-help-center-translate/" rel="nofollow ugc">how to translate and localize the plugin</a>.</p>
<h4>TAKE IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL WITH ELEMENTOR PRO</h4>
<p>Create immersive web experiences while saving time and resources, keeping costs manageable with <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-elementor-pro-elementor-pro/" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Pro</a>. Get access to +90 professional widgets, features, and tools to create comprehensive website experiences.</p>
<p>Elementor Pro’s features include:<br />
&#8211; <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-library-exclusive-pro-kits-and-templates/" rel="nofollow ugc">Exclusive Pro Kits and Templates</a><br />

&#8211; <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-pro-features-professional-form-builder-and-submission-log/" rel="nofollow ugc">Professional Form Builder and Submission Log</a><br />
&#8211; <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-pro-features-popup-builder/" rel="nofollow ugc">Popup Builder</a><br />
&#8211; <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-pro-features-dynamic-content-2/" rel="nofollow ugc">Dynamic Content</a><br />
&#8211; Marketing automation and CRM integrations<br />
&#8211; Scroll Snap<br />
&#8211; Custom fonts &amp; icons<br />

&#8211; Global widgets<br />
&#8211; Custom CSS<br />
&#8211; Custom Code<br />
&#8211; 90+ Professional widgets<br />
&#8211; And many more.</p>
<p>Join the elite web creators who enjoy <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-elementor-pro-elementor-pro-2/" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Pro</a>!</p>
<h4>SECURITY AND COMPLIANCE</h4>
<p>Elementor is ISO 27001 certified and has a dedicated team of security professionals that implements industry best practices for maximum security and compliance 24/7.</p>
<p>There is also a managed security <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-bug-crowd-bug-bounty-program/" rel="nofollow ugc">Bug Bounty program</a>, utilizing the community power by enabling 24/7/365 crowdsourced vulnerability detection.</p>
<h4>ELEMENTOR RESOURCES AND SUPPORT</h4>
<ul>
<li>To learn how to get started with Elementor, or view tutorials about new features, go to the <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-academy-elementor-academy/" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Academy</a> or the <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-help-center-help-center/" rel="nofollow ugc">Help Center</a>.</li>
<li>If you have any more questions or need support, visit the support on the <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-wordpress-plugin-forum/" rel="nofollow ugc">Plugin’s forum</a>. Elementor Pro users can also reach out to a dedicated support channel for premium 24/7 support.</li>
<li>For more information about Elementor and Elementor Pro features, visit <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-homepage-elementor-website-builder/" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Website Builder</a>.</li>
</ul>

";s:12:"installation";s:1579:"<h4>Minimum Requirements</h4>
<ul>
<li>WordPress 5.9 or greater</li>
<li>PHP version 7.0 or greater</li>
<li>MySQL version 5.0 or greater</li>
</ul>
<h4>We recommend your host supports:</h4>
<ul>
<li>PHP version 7.3 or greater</li>
<li>MySQL version 5.6 or greater</li>
<li>WordPress Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)</li>
</ul>
<p><span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe loading="lazy" class="youtube-player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ypn6fltn_7s?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;fs=1&#038;hl=en-US&#038;autohide=2&#038;wmode=transparent" allowfullscreen="true" style="border:0;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation"></iframe></span></p>
<h4>Installation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the <code>wp-content/plugins/</code> directory of your WordPress installation.</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress.</li>
<li>Go to Pages &gt; Add New</li>
<li>Press the &#8216;Edit with Elementor&#8217; button.</li>
<li>Now you can drag and drop widgets from the left panel onto the content area, as well as add new sections and columns that make up the page structure.</li>
</ol>
<p>For documentation and tutorials visit our <a href="https://elementor.com/help/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Knowledge Base</a>.</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:4860:"
<dt id='how%20do%20i%20install%20elementor%3F'>
How do I install Elementor?
</h4>
<p>
<p>To install the free version of Elementor, follow the steps below:<br />
From your WordPress dashboard -&gt; Go to Plugins -&gt; Click on &#8216;Add new&#8217;-&gt; In the Search field, enter Elementor and choose Elementor website builder.<br />
Press install -&gt; After installation, click Activate.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20elementor%20work%20with%20all%20the%20themes%3F'>
Does Elementor work with all the themes?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Elementor works all the themes that respect the coding standards of WordPress set by its Codex. It is recommended to use Elementor&#8217;s <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-hello-theme-hello-theme/" rel="nofollow ugc">Hello Theme</a>, a lightweight blank canvas, to enjoy full flexibility when using Elementor, and optimize your experience.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20elementor%20compatible%20with%20gutenberg%3F'>
Is Elementor compatible with Gutenberg?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Elementor and Gutenberg work seamlessly together. As a user, you can easily decide which editor to use at every point while editing your site.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20create%20an%20online%20store%3F'>
Can I create an online store?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, with the Elementor Pro WooCommerce Builder you can customize every page of your store to create an amazing customer experience that drives sales.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20it%20work%20with%20other%20wordpress%20plugins%3F'>
Does it work with other WordPress plugins?
</h4>
<p>
<p>It works with almost all the plugins. If you experience an incompatibility issue, please report it to us and to the plugin that conflicts with Elementor.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20i%20need%20to%20know%20how%20to%20code%3F'>
Do I need to know how to code?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No! Elementor provides you with all the widgets and features that you need to build a proffesional website without using code.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20i%20need%20to%20know%20how%20to%20design%3F'>
Do i need to know how to design?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No, you can choose between professionaly designed kits and templates that fit toevery industry and have all you need to create your own profesional website.</p>
</p>
<dt id='will%20elementor%20slow%20down%20my%20website%3F'>
Will elementor slow down my website?
</h4>
<p>
<p>As Elementor prioritizes speed and performance, you enjoy better and faster performance with each new version of Elementor. When testing the same page layout on older versions you can see a significant performance improvement, from a score of 82 in Google PageSpeed Insight in version 3.1, to a score of 95 i in version 3.5.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20my%20site%20secure%20with%20elementor%3F'>
Is my site secure with Elementor?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The security of your website is extremely important to us and we take proactive measures to assure that your websites are secure. Elementor is ISO 27001 certified, and has a dedicated team of security professionals that implements industry best-practices for maximum security and compliance, 24/7.</p>
<p>There is also a managed security Bug Bounty program, utilizing the community power by enabling 24/7/365 crowdsourced vulnerability detection.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20buy%20templates%20separately%3F'>
Can I buy templates separately?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Of course, you can use any template that supports Elementor.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20elementor%20compatible%20with%20post%20and%20custom%20post%20types%3F'>
Is Elementor compatible with Post and Custom Post Types?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Of course! You can set which post types will enable Elementor in the settings page.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20is%20the%20difference%20between%20elementor%27s%20free%20plugin%20and%20elementor%20pro'>
What is the difference between Elementor&#8217;s free Plugin and Elementor Pro
</h4>
<p>
<p>Elementor’s Free version allows you to explore our revolutionary drag &amp; drop live editor, basic widgets and templates. Elementor Pro (Essential, Advanced, Expert, Studio, and Agency) empowers you with more professional tools that speed up your workflow, give you access to human-powered support, help you build more advanced content, and convert visitors. See full comparison here.</p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20can%20i%20become%20a%20contributor'>
How can I become a Contributor
</h4>
<p>
<p>If you want to contribute, go to our <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor GitHub Repository</a> and see where you can help.<br />
You can also add a new language via <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-wordpress-plugin-translate/" rel="nofollow ugc">translate.wordpress.org</a>. We’ve built a short guide explaining <a href="https://go.elementor.com/wp-repo-description-tab-wordpress-plugin-translate-faq/" rel="nofollow ugc">how to translate and localize the plugin</a>.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:340852:"<p>See Elementor Developer Edition versions changelog <a href="https://go.elementor.com/dev-changelog/" rel="nofollow ugc">here</a></p>
<h4>3.15.1 &#8211; 2023-08-02</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Error notices appear on front after schemes code deprecated</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.15.0 &#8211; 2023-07-31</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Accordion widget &#8211; Unleash your design creativity with nesting capabilities and layout flexibility (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2587" rel="nofollow ugc">#2587</a>)</li>
<li>New: Enhancements Elementor AI for Images &#8211; Seamlessly Remove and Replace Backgrounds</li>
<li>New: Introducing Apps Page &#8211; Discover a selection of tools, specifically tailored to enhance your Elementor-powered website</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a &#8220;Container&#8221; option to the &#8216;Hover Area&#8217; dropdown in Lottie widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20360" rel="nofollow ugc">#20360</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated several URLs from <code>http:</code> to <code>https</code> for enhanced compliance (props <a href="https://github.com/DAnn2012" rel="nofollow ugc">@DAnn2012</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Image Size control to Gravatar image in Author Box widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Remove deprecated schemes area</li>
<li>Tweak: Accessibility Improvements feature merged to version</li>
<li>Tweak: Deleted <code>aspect-ratio</code> from SASS files</li>
<li>Tweak: Added keyboard accessibility to Repeater control</li>
<li>Tweak: Unified the appearance of <code>stretch</code> and <code>center</code> buttons in Tabs widgets</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>eicons</code> library to v5.21.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Group together position controls in Icon Box widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Group together position controls in Image Box widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added additional units to lightbox controls</li>
<li>Tweak: Implemented CSS logical properties in Elementor App</li>
<li>Tweak: Implemented CSS logical properties in Elementor Editor</li>
<li>Tweak: Enhanced <code>text-align</code> property by implementing CSS logical properties</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved panel UI in Video widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced Display Percentage select control to toggle control in Progress Bar widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added &#8220;Title HTML Tag&#8221; to Title in Progress Bar widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated recommended PHP version</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>classes_dictionary</code> support for editor controls</li>
<li>Tweak: Expanded AI resize option elevating the resolution limit to 2048px</li>
<li>Tweak: Landing Pages feature downgraded to BETA status</li>
<li>Tweak: Promoted &#8220;Global Style Preview&#8221; feature to BETA status</li>
<li>Fix: Responsive settings for Section Templates won&#8217;t entirely save when Additional Breakpoints feature is active (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19394" rel="nofollow ugc">#19394</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19394" rel="nofollow ugc">#19394</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Video lightbox incorrect aspect ratio when multiple video widgets are utilized on the same page (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/21649" rel="nofollow ugc">#21649</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Disabling popup overlay does not disable it in the editor (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/22412" rel="nofollow ugc">#22412</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Corrected typo in <code>DONOTCACHCEOBJECT</code> to <code>DONOTCACHEOBJECT</code> for accurate <code>do_not_cache</code> definition (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/22786" rel="nofollow ugc">#22786</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Stretch option is not working as expected when items are set to the sides in Tabs widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/22774" rel="nofollow ugc">#22774</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Color picker is not working as expected on document settings (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/22867" rel="nofollow ugc">#22867</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Updated text domain of multiple strings to exclude &#8216;elementor-pro&#8217; for better compatibility (props <a href="https://github.com/DAnn2012" rel="nofollow ugc">@DAnn2012</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Video overlay image <code>aspect-ratio</code> fixes</li>
<li>Fix: Rectified template categories filter to reference the correct ID accurately</li>
<li>Fix: Lightbox overlay color was not visible when previewing the lightbox within the editor</li>
</ul>

<li>Tweak: Added a vertical alignment control to icons in Icon List widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16464" rel="nofollow ugc">#16464</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16056" rel="nofollow ugc">#16056</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19237" rel="nofollow ugc">#19237</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16237" rel="nofollow ugc">#16237</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18420" rel="nofollow ugc">#18420</a>)</li>

<li>Tweak: Added <code>vw</code> unit to margin and padding in Column, Section, and Container elements (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20890" rel="nofollow ugc">#20890</a>, props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>

<li>Tweak: Separated title and description control labels in Icon Box and Image Box widgets (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added units to <code>container_width</code> and <code>widgets_gap</code> in site settings (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added units for Word Spacing control in Text Path widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Extracted Stretch Section handler to a more generic Stretch Element</li>
<li>Tweak: Refactored show and hide tab content callbacks to be more generic in Tabs widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated minimum required WordPress version to 5.9</li>
<li>Tweak: Separated overview dashboard function to multiple functions in WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Tweak: Added thumbnail to most recently installed kit in Elementor Import/export screen</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Transition Duration control to text hover color in Icon List widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Display normal &amp; hover icon colors in tabs view in Icon List widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added additional size units and custom units in all elements</li>
<li>Tweak: Added remove current kit alert before applying a new kit in import process</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed redundant default units in various elements</li>
<li>Tweak: Upgrade Swiper Library feature promoted to Stable status</li>
<li>Tweak: Save as Default feature merged to version</li>
<li>Fix: Padding is set to text span instead of icon span in Icon List widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9831" rel="nofollow ugc">#9831</a>, props <a href="https://github.com/cirkut" rel="nofollow ugc">@cirkut</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Save as Default functionality breaks Image Carousel and Loop Carousel widgets in various scenarios (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/21371" rel="nofollow ugc">#21371</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Content styling controls are not targeting the right container in Tabs widget</li>
<li>Fix: Containers are still editable in Editor preview mode</li>
<li>Fix: &#8220;Choose Image&#8221; control is missing in Safari 14 in various image elements</li>
</ul>

<ul>

<h4>3.11.0 &#8211; 2023-02-13</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Copy and Paste Between Websites functionality (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9424" rel="nofollow ugc">#9424</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19183" rel="nofollow ugc">#19183</a>)</li>
<li>New: Responsive background Image Size &#8211; Adjust image size per device to improve performance (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/6778" rel="nofollow ugc">#6778</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3722" rel="nofollow ugc">#3722</a>)</li>
<li>New: Updated Swiper Library to 8.4.5 as a Beta experiment (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18724" rel="nofollow ugc">#18724</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Google Fonts list with 125 new fonts (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20229" rel="nofollow ugc">#20229</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>accent-color</code> support to Form fields in Site Settings</li>
<li>Tweak: Use <code>aspect-ratio</code> property instead of CSS trick in Video widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>eicons</code> library to v5.18.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>generator</code> meta tag to identify active performance settings and experiments</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved logo visibility in Site Logo widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated error messages when replacing URLs in Elementor Tools screen</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated error messages on import/export functionality</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a responsive control to custom image spacing in Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Renamed &#8220;Experiments&#8221; settings tab to &#8220;Features&#8221; for better clarity</li>
<li>Tweak: Merged &#8220;Hide WP widgets from search&#8221; experiment to the version</li>
<li>Tweak: Promoted &#8220;Nested Elements&#8221; experiment to BETA status</li>
<li>Tweak: Promoted &#8220;Flexbox Container&#8221; experiment to RC status</li>
<li>Tweak: Promoted &#8220;Save as Default&#8221; experiment to Stable status</li>
<li>Fix: Rename <code>e-action-hash</code> attribute to <code>data-e-action-hash</code> attribute (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20513" rel="nofollow ugc">#20513</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16418" rel="nofollow ugc">#16418</a>, props <a href="https://github.com/huubl" rel="nofollow ugc">@huubl</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Justify Content icons are inverted in RTL when direction is set to column in Container (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20083" rel="nofollow ugc">#20083</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Various issues when using the convert-to-container functionality</li>
<li>Fix: Tabs widget changes width size when direction set to row or column in Container</li>
<li>Fix: Adjusted right-click menu dark mode for blocked options</li>
<li>Fix: Can&#8217;t rollback Elementor version to older Core version</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.10.2 &#8211; 2023-01-29</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix: PHP 8.x throws errors and notices in some cases (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/21087" rel="nofollow ugc">#21087</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Keyboard actions are not blocked on main tab container in Tabs widget</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.10.1 &#8211; 2023-01-17</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Child containers inheriting styles from parent container (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20669" rel="nofollow ugc">#20669</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Lazyload not working after load more action in loop builder items</li>
<li>Fix: Tab toggle is not working as expected after dragging a widget to any tab in Tabs widget</li>
<li>Fix: Elementor Top bar is not fully responsive when WP sidebar is collapsed</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.10.0 &#8211; 2023-01-09</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing the renewed Tabs widget &#8211; Enable more design options, and nesting capabilities (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2587" rel="nofollow ugc">#2587</a>)</li>
<li>New: Introducing Custom Units &#8211; A new way to choose any unit you want, including CSS Math Functions (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2219" rel="nofollow ugc">#2219</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19935" rel="nofollow ugc">#19935</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18738" rel="nofollow ugc">#18738</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8307" rel="nofollow ugc">#8307</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11335" rel="nofollow ugc">#11335</a>)</li>
<li>New: Container-based website assets &#8211; Kickstart your website creation and design process with container-based full website kits, templates and blocks</li>
<li>New: Added an option to disable Google Fonts integration from font-family control</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>preload="metadata"</code> to self hosted videos in Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/17308" rel="nofollow ugc">#17308</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>preload</code> selector to self hosted videos in Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/17308" rel="nofollow ugc">#17308</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>loading="lazy"</code> for custom size in media control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/17884" rel="nofollow ugc">#17884</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added additional units for width and height in Icon List widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added additional units for icon size in Icon List Widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>loading="lazy"</code> to Google Map widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>eicons</code> library to 5.17.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Merged various experiments to the version</li>
<li>Tweak: Promoted various experiments to Beta and Stable status</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Undo option into success toast in &#8220;Save as Default&#8221; experiment</li>
<li>Tweak: Media control return image URL from WordPress in Style CSS</li>
<li>Tweak: General infrastructure changes to Import Export Website Kit experiment</li>
<li>Fix: RTL text is printed backward in Text Path widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/17309" rel="nofollow ugc">#17309</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Unnecessary <code>non-existing control</code> errors are thrown on page load (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20027" rel="nofollow ugc">#20027</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Post type is overridden on autosave for library documents (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1994" rel="nofollow ugc">#1994</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Compatibility issue with Rank Math plugin due to <code>wp_print_media_template()</code> in onboarding module (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18368" rel="nofollow ugc">#18368</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Auto detection of dark mode not working in the Theme Builder (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19670" rel="nofollow ugc">#19670</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Missing escaping translation in Experiments screen</li>
<li>Fix: Motion effect on background image disables background overlay in Container</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.9.2 &#8211; 2022-12-21</h4>

<li>Fix: Responsive values are not saving as part of Save as Default functionality</li>
</ul>

<li>Fix: Background Overlay is not uploading in Container when using the Lazy Load experiment</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.9.0 &#8211; 2022-12-06</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Save as Default as a Beta experiment &#8211; Create your default settings for every element for better consistency</li>
<li>New: Introducing Background images Lazy Load as an Alpha experiment</li>
<li>Tweak: Separate &#8220;Default&#8221; and &#8220;None&#8221; values in Border Type control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11565" rel="nofollow ugc">#11565</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13328" rel="nofollow ugc">#13328</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11723" rel="nofollow ugc">#11723</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>dnt</code> param to Vimeo embed background and Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13797" rel="nofollow ugc">#13797</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13631" rel="nofollow ugc">#13631</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Transform section to Advanced tab in Flexbox Container (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18648" rel="nofollow ugc">#18648</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18268" rel="nofollow ugc">#18268</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for Border Radius in Button widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18914" rel="nofollow ugc">#18914</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control to opacity of background overlay image in Sections and Containers (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19659" rel="nofollow ugc">#19659</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed extra SQL queries on every page for better performance (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12162" rel="nofollow ugc">#12162</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added background color option to the video background control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4353" rel="nofollow ugc">#4353</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for caption to Image, Image Gallery and Image Carousel widgets (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control to icon border radius in Icon and Social Icons widgets (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>em</code> unit to Word Spacing control in Text Path widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control to image border radius in Image Carousel, Basic Gallery and Testimonial widgets (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Make Elementor compatible with WebP uploads via Performance Lab plugin</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>em</code> units to border radius control in various elements</li>
<li>Tweak: Upgraded the <code>autoprefixer</code> package to better minify CSS files</li>
<li>Tweak: Added more units options to Border Width control in various elements</li>
<li>Tweak: Adjusted Dark Mode in Navigator when using Container</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>rel=preconnect</code> tag to Google Fonts to improve performance</li>
<li>Tweak: Added escape translation strings for safe use in HTML output</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed redundant labels from group controls</li>
<li>Tweak: Added new margin controls to Post and Page Settings</li>
<li>Tweak: Allow saving and reloading a page while in-place editing of documents</li>
<li>Tweak: Added compatibility for Yoast Duplicate Post plugin</li>
<li>Tweak: Added new hook action when element handler ready</li>
<li>Fix: Predefined container structure with default padding is not working (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19990" rel="nofollow ugc">#19990</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Repeater controls in <code>non-content</code> tabs cause JS errors when running Copy-Paste Style (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19895" rel="nofollow ugc">#19895</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Various widgets disappear in certain scenarios when choosing direction Row or Column in Container</li>
<li>Fix: Align items controls are not working as expected in container when using Spacer widget with custom width</li>
<li>Fix: Pasting an element into the Preview Container throws a JS error in console</li>
<li>Fix: Can&#8217;t drag widgets into a Column after it&#8217;s being emptied</li>
<li>Fix: First container handle is not centered on an RTL language</li>
</ul>

<h4>3.8.0 &#8211; 2022-10-30</h4>

<li>New: Revert your Website to its Previous Condition &#8211; Allow removing the last imported Kit</li>

<li>Tweak: Increase inputs in Replace URL tool to support long URLs (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19559" rel="nofollow ugc">#19559</a>)</li>

<li>Tweak: Improved browser responsiveness during Elementor&#8217;s initialization process (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/15228" rel="nofollow ugc">#15228</a>, props <a href="https://github.com/FlyingDR" rel="nofollow ugc">@FlyingDR</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Responsive control to Text Align in Columns and Sections (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13199" rel="nofollow ugc">#13199</a>, props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>

<li>Tweak: Added more size units to Size and Spacing controls Icon and Icon box widgets (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19496" rel="nofollow ugc">#19496</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added labels to font weight numeric values (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18761" rel="nofollow ugc">#18761</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>rem</code> unit to gap between elements control in Container widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/18261" rel="nofollow ugc">#18261</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added clarification for the <code>a</code> tag to the container element (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added text stroke to number in Counter widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added text stroke to title in Counter widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added text stroke to text in Divider widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>em</code> unit for border radius to layout elements (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added text stroke to title in Image Box widget (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added more size units to Spacing and Image Size in Testimonial and Image Box widgets (props <a href="https://github.com/rodolphebertozzo" rel="nofollow ugc">@rodolphebertozzo</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced <code>e-container</code> class name to <code>e-con</code> in Container</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced <code>e-container--width-boxed</code> class name to <code>e-con-boxed</code> in Container</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced <code>e-container--width-full</code> class name to <code>e-con-full</code> in Container</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced <code>e-container__inner</code> class name to <code>e-con-inner</code> in Container</li>
<li>Tweak: Custom links in menu items should be relative to the site address when importing a Kit</li>
<li>Tweak: Import/Export CLI and UI mechanisms were merged into a unified service</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved the UX of dependencies between experiments</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed Full-width and Boxed content width functionality in Container</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed default Google fonts loading method to &#8220;Swap&#8221; on new sites</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed default direction for Featured sorting to ASC in Kit Library</li>
<li>Tweak: Added migrate script to handle retro PHP8 type error on image custom size</li>
<li>Tweak: Re-organized SCSS files for the Container</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed default Content Width when adding a new Container from right click context-menu</li>
<li>Fix: <code>isolation: isolate</code> property causing z-index issues in various scenarios when using Container (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19834" rel="nofollow ugc">#19834</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19845" rel="nofollow ugc">#19845</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19705" rel="nofollow ugc">#19705</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20011" rel="nofollow ugc">#20011</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Responsive controls with responsive conditions whose values are arrays (Base Multiple) did not apply in the frontend for non-desktop devices (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19924" rel="nofollow ugc">#19924</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19917" rel="nofollow ugc">#19917</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19922" rel="nofollow ugc">#19922</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19894" rel="nofollow ugc">#19894</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19930" rel="nofollow ugc">#19930</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/20001" rel="nofollow ugc">#20001</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Importer WordPress root write permissions check causes import failures (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/17255" rel="nofollow ugc">#17255</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Removed unnecessary default <code>max-width</code> and <code>flex-grow</code> settings in various widgets when using Container (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19891" rel="nofollow ugc">#19891</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Transitions functionality is not working as expected in Container (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19913" rel="nofollow ugc">#19913</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Progress Bar layout is not presented as expected when direction is set to row in Container</li>
<li>Fix: Insert library button is clickable while inserting a template</li>
<li>Fix: Go pro link UI glitch in export kit tool</li>
<li>Fix: Export kit doesn&#8217;t work in a Multisite Network</li>
<li>Fix: WooCommerce products and categories are not imported as expected when assigned to a menu</li>
<li>Fix: CSS minified files not generated on build</li>
<li>Fix: Editor controls color issues in dark mode scheme</li>
</ul>
