<li>Fix: Custom Image Size generates a fatal error after updating to PHP 8+</li>
<li>Fix: <code>is_current_user_can_edit</code> not working correctly when <code>$post_id</code> missing</li>

<h4>3.7.4 &#8211; 2022-08-31</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Removed redundant code in various widgets that includes images (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12268" rel="nofollow ugc">#12268</a>, props <a href="https://github.com/ibndawood" rel="nofollow ugc">@ibndawood</a>)</li>

<h4>3.7.3 &#8211; 2022-08-29</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Errors in deprecation module prevent Elementor editor to load (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19390" rel="nofollow ugc">#19390</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/19562" rel="nofollow ugc">#19562</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: <code>add_link_attributes</code> function does not overwrite all in foreach loop item link attributes (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11498" rel="nofollow ugc">#11498</a>, props <a href="https://github.com/afoster" rel="nofollow ugc">@sol1</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed the clickable logo link in Theme Builder</li>
</ul>

<h4>3.5.0 &#8211; 2021-12-14</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing CSS Transform &#8211; rotate, scale, skew, offset and flip any element (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12451" rel="nofollow ugc">#12451</a>)</li>
<li>New: Meet Multi-Select for page elements &#8211; improve your workflow process by making bulk actions (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8006" rel="nofollow ugc">#8006</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/879" rel="nofollow ugc">#879</a>)</li>
<li>New: Meet Favorite widgets section &#8211; save your most useful widgets for easier accessibility (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2184" rel="nofollow ugc">#2184</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11443" rel="nofollow ugc">#11443</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Text Stroke control &#8211; highlight titles with colorful outlines to in Heading, Icon Box, Tabs, Accordion, and Text path widgets (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11158" rel="nofollow ugc">#11158</a>)</li>
<li>Experiment: Hide native WordPress widgets from panel search results &#8211; remove unwanted widgets from the widgets panel</li>
<li>Tweak: Adjusted Inline Font Icons experiment to work with <code>eicons</code> library and save up to 110KB of asset loading (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8572" rel="nofollow ugc">#8572</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11361" rel="nofollow ugc">#11361</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Detect and present contextual errors messages in the Import/Export flow for better troubleshooting (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/15630" rel="nofollow ugc">#15630</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/15715" rel="nofollow ugc">#15715</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Elementor license plan filter to Kit Library (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16075" rel="nofollow ugc">#16075</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Reverse columns option to Additional Custom Breakpoints Experiment (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16322" rel="nofollow ugc">#16322</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12925" rel="nofollow ugc">#12925</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Adjusted widgets to work with Inline-CSS Experiment and Additional Custom Breakpoints experiment (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16126" rel="nofollow ugc">#16126</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added the option to search by tag names in the Kit Library (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16075" rel="nofollow ugc">#16075</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a quick Apply Kit modal option in the Kit Library</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Experiments screen structure for better experiments discoverabilty</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Word Spacing control to typography group control</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Pro promotion screen for Custom Code feature</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed the Archive Posts and Archive Title widgets from widgets panel search results in non Archive templates</li>
<li>Tweak: Prompt the user permission to allow unfiltered file uploads in the Import Kit flow</li>
<li>Tweak: Optimized Kit library index page performance</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved performance of <code>WP_Query</code> by adding <code>no_found_rows=true</code> parameter</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved performance of loading the &#8220;My templates&#8221; while loading the Templates library</li>
<li>Tweak: Minimum height wasn&#8217;t defined to all responsive devices</li>
<li>Tweak: Experiments status added to the system info for better debugging</li>
<li>Tweak: Safe mode now deactivates Elementor Experiments</li>
<li>Tweak: UI improvement for cascaded responsive control units</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Dialog library to <code>4.9.0</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Added a unified components registration for widgets, controls, form actions, dynamic tags, and finder categories</li>
<li>Tweak: Disabled the option to change the desktop height and width fields in the responsive bar</li>
<li>Tweak: Redundant inline CSS code was removed with the use of <code>eicons</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Implemented Redux framework for future features support</li>
<li>Tweak: Allow &#8220;Edit Buttons&#8221; options to be extended by 3rd party developers</li>
<li>Tweak: <code>Editor/Documents</code> moved to <code>/editor/components</code> folder</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a filter to Context Menu Groups</li>
<li>Fix: Hamburger button didn&#8217;t open on mobile in Nav menu widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16682" rel="nofollow ugc">#16682</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Adding multiple repeater controls in one section craetes a onflict (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13117" rel="nofollow ugc">#13117</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Finder incorrectly identifies pages created through Finder as a Post type instead of Page type (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12502" rel="nofollow ugc">#12502</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Unexpected behavior if <code>ctrl</code> + mouse click was used on mac (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5228" rel="nofollow ugc">#5228</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Edit header handles don&#8217;t show up if the <code>z-index</code> of the header section is over 99 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16214" rel="nofollow ugc">#16214</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Slides per view can&#8217;t be set to default if there is a widescreen value in the Testimonial Carousel widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16210" rel="nofollow ugc">#16210</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Dividers not vertically centered in Icon List widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16431" rel="nofollow ugc">#16431</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Text typography control is missing in Text Path widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16805" rel="nofollow ugc">#16805</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Column padding affected absolute positioned elements (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16572" rel="nofollow ugc">#16572</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Some controls disappear in responsive devices when Additional Custom Breakpoint experiment is active (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/16608" rel="nofollow ugc">#16608</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Menu Anchor widget didn&#8217;t scroll to the appropriate ID if Scroll Snap is active (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/17035" rel="nofollow ugc">#17035</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: SVG sanitizer is failing if there is a line break after <code>&lt;/svg&gt;</code></li>
<li>Fix: Image Carousel widget ignored padding and margin inside columns</li>
<li>Fix: Theme Builder close button not functioning if the page was refreshed</li>
<li>Fix: Pro widget promotional popover CTA text was incorrect when Elementor Pro is activated but not connected</li>
<li>Fix: Section editing handle is not accessible when Section is placed below a Header</li>
<li>Fix: Run DB calculations only on sites that are required to</li>
<li>Fix: UI glitch in Google maps widgets</li>
<li>Fix: CLI &#8216;library import&#8217; deletes the original imported file when importing a template</li>
<li>Fix: Updated Admin Top Bar font for Non-English languages</li>
<li>Fix: Elementor top bar is not presented in License page</li>
<li>Fix: Template name changed if a dash mark was used in the Import process</li>
<li>Fix: Empty state background was missing from the Media controls</li>
<li>Fix: Apply Kit option threw an error when used with PHP 8.0</li>
<li>Fix: Sticky option threw an error and cause the editor not to work</li>
<li>Fix: UI glitch in &#8220;Get beta updates&#8221; modal</li>
<li>Fix: Scroll snap caused UI glitches and threw undefined error on Archive pages</li>
<li>Fix: Vertical align control disappeared if used in a custom position on a custom breakpoint</li>
<li>Fix: Choose controls in RTL sites were inverted</li>
<li>Fix: Elementor notices were being displayed in the plugin update screen</li>
<li>Fix: Z-index control overrides negative values</li>
<li>Fix: Text Path widget causes redundant file system calls</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>get_add_new_landing_page_url</code> (props <a href="https://github.com/HeyMehedi" rel="nofollow ugc">@HeyMehedi</a>)</li>
<li>Deprecated: See all deprecations to this version in our <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v3-5-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Deprecations Post</a></li>
</ul>

<li>Fix: After downgrading from a version with Container experiment active a PHP error is thrown</li>
</ul>

<h4>3.3.0 &#8211; 2021-07-13</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Kits Library &#8211; Create Entire Websites Faster Than Ever (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4417" rel="nofollow ugc">#4417</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11341" rel="nofollow ugc">#11341</a>)</li>
<li>New: Meet the Color Color Sampler &#8211; fetch colors from every image and populated color control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/14868" rel="nofollow ugc">#14868</a>)</li>
<li>Experiment: Improved CSS Loading &#8211; Load widgets CSS only when needed (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13533" rel="nofollow ugc">#13533</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8572" rel="nofollow ugc">#8572</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Animations CSS library to be loaded conditionally when needed when Improved Asset Load experiment is active (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13533" rel="nofollow ugc">#13533</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8572" rel="nofollow ugc">#8572</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added the ability to fetch Image from external URL (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/413" rel="nofollow ugc">#413</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive capabilities to Content width in Section and Inner Section elements (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12963" rel="nofollow ugc">#12963</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added “Hidden Elements” User Preference control to choose whether to show or hide hidden elements in responsive mode (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12316" rel="nofollow ugc">#12316</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added User Preference control to set the default responsive device when the responsive view is triggered (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/14662" rel="nofollow ugc">#14662</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added an Elementor top bar to all Elementor screens in the WordPress admin pages for better discoverability (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/15276" rel="nofollow ugc">#15276</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/15250" rel="nofollow ugc">#15250</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added gradient button capabilities to Button instances in Theme Style (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/14731" rel="nofollow ugc">#14731</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed Landing Pages experiment to be active by default on all websites</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Kit Import and Export tool to include Posts, Pages, Custom Post Types and WooCommerce Products</li>
<li>Tweak: Allow unlimited export of Elementor-created content in Import/Export tool</li>
<li>Tweak: Included Homepage setting in Import/Export tool</li>
<li>Tweak: Throw an error when running Import process via CLI if user is not Administrator role</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Informative modal links in Import/Export tool</li>
<li>Tweak: Modified Kit information area to be collapsible in Import/Export tool</li>
<li>Tweak: Added custom fields support to Import/Export Experiment</li>
<li>Tweak: Added future support for Additional Breakpoints</li>
<li>Tweak: Changing the <code>content-filters</code> to be accessed publicly</li>
<li>Tweak: Regenerate Files admin button resets all page-assets data</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Kit Import and Export tool to include conditions conflicts resolver</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Kit information to Import and Export tool</li>
<li>Tweak: Added summary screens to Import and Export tool</li>
<li>Tweak: Converted Improved Asset Loading Experiment registration to the post save process instead of loading process</li>
<li>Tweak: Widgets search can accept non-english strings for better UX</li>
<li>Tweak: Polished Responsive top bar UI</li>
<li>Tweak: Created an Uploads manager util to better handle files being uploaded</li>
<li>Tweak: Added default height to Tablet and Mobile devices</li>
<li>Tweak: Polished Select2 control UI</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Pro promotion in Submission feature page</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Font Awesome icons library to v5.15.3</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a new filter <code>elementor/document/save/data</code> to allow manipulation when document save starts</li>
<li>Tweak: Added usage schema in <code>schemas/usage</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Recalculate elements usage each upgrade</li>
<li>Tweak: Added &#8220;Recreate Kit&#8221; button in Elementor settings only when the Default Kit does not exist</li>
<li>Tweak: Made <code>elementorFrontend.getDeviceSetting()</code> method dynamic</li>
<li>Fix: Inline editing not working when the Optimized DOM experiment is on (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/14703" rel="nofollow ugc">#14703</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Exit animation flickers in several cases (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/14459" rel="nofollow ugc">#14459</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/14703" rel="nofollow ugc">#13180</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Lightbox is not working in the frontend (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/15080" rel="nofollow ugc">#15080</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/15085" rel="nofollow ugc">#15085</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Prevent Default Kit from being recreated when kit not exists (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13299" rel="nofollow ugc">#13299</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Social icons alignment shift right in Safari browsers (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13122" rel="nofollow ugc">#13122</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Gradient control doesn&#8217;t work when using Global Colors (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13288" rel="nofollow ugc">#13288</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Social Icons and Share button space disappeared when optimizing the HTML (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13279" rel="nofollow ugc">#13279</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: UI glitch in the empty state of Global widgets tab</li>
<li>Fix: Breakpoints values in the Panel are not enforced</li>
<li>Fix: Error thrown in Template library if Expert template been imported</li>
<li>Fix: Panel search bar appears above the overlay on load</li>
<li>Fix: Slides widget is not displaying properly in the Editor</li>
<li>Fix: Activation account connection error on IDN domains</li>
<li>Fix: Video item didn’t started playing without adding an image overlay in Media Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: Inline editing not working when the Optimized DOM experiment is active</li>
<li>Fix: Site Identity data been transferred when importing a Kit</li>
<li>Fix: WordPress content Featured images are not being imported when applying a Kit</li>
<li>Fix: Post Excerpt is not imported when applying a Kit via Import Kit tool</li>
<li>Fix: Default Kit file not being created in Multisite WordPress instances</li>
<li>Fix: Dark mode UI glitches in Import/Export tool</li>
<li>Fix: Close and back to dashboard buttons are not being redirected to the correct page in Import/Export experiment</li>
<li>Fix: Collapse button disappeared on mobile if the user not logged in Video Playlist widget</li>
<li>Fix: Import process fail message is shown when importing a Kit from ThemeForest</li>
<li>Fix: Large images optimized by WordPress can&#8217;t be displayed properly via dynamic Toolset fields</li>
<li>Fix: Dynamic control is not working in Text Path widget</li>
<li>Fix: Column removed from a section in the Navigator resulted in an empty section</li>
<li>Fix: Unable to drag and drop columns from one above other</li>
<li>Deprecated: See all deprecations to this version in our <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v3-3-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Deprecations Post</a></li>

<li>Fix: Landing Pages can cause a fatal error for Author roles in the WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Fix: <code>&lt;a&gt;</code> tags placed in an SVG file trigger the Lightbox</li>
<li>Fix: Hardened allowed options in the editor to enforce better security policies</li>
<li>Fix: Removed <code>html</code> option in Lightbox module to prevent security issues</li>
</ul>

<h4>3.1.2 &#8211; 2021-03-02</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Added Lazy load option for YouTube in Video widget to prevent conflicts (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13898" rel="nofollow ugc">#13898</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Allow overwriting the assets URL when using a mirror domain (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13701" rel="nofollow ugc">#13701</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed deprecated <code>jQuery</code> functions for WP 5.7 compatibility</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a <code>mixin</code> for <code>webkit-scrollbar</code> design in Table of Content widget CSS</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>--force</code> CLI replace command to always return the number of replaces</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a Lazy Load control for YouTube source in Background Video</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>eicons</code> library to v5.11.0</li>
<li>Fix: Youtube videos didn&#8217;t work properly when Privacy mode is enabled and &#8220;Improved Asset Loading&#8221; experiment is disabled (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13711" rel="nofollow ugc">#13711</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Error event will not always have an <code>originalEvent</code> (props <a href="https://github.com/enisdenjo" rel="nofollow ugc">@enisdenjo</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Background Video protocol wasn&#8217;t using <code>https</code> for <code>youtube-nocookie</code> option in Video widget</li>
<li>Fix: Youtube API script was loaded when Image overlay is used</li>
<li>Fix: Navigator overlapped preview area if attached to the right</li>
<li>Fix: Column layout glitch when changing the section structure</li>
<li>Fix: Landing page created via the Admin bar wasn&#8217;t created with Canvas layout</li>
<li>Fix: Sanitized options in the editor to enforce better security policies</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.1.1 &#8211; 2021-01-31</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Minor UI improvements in Compatibility tag</li>
<li>Fix: Async JS loading conflicted with <code>wp.i18n</code> (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13708" rel="nofollow ugc">#13708</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13746" rel="nofollow ugc">#13746</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/console-error-43/" rel="ugc">Topic</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Elementor loads unnecessary <code>wp-polyfills.min.js</code> script in Frontend (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13720" rel="nofollow ugc">#13720</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Landing Pages experiment removes content in static blog pages (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13706" rel="nofollow ugc">#13706</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13728" rel="nofollow ugc">#13728</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13725" rel="nofollow ugc">#13725</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/blog-page-not-showing-after-update-3/" rel="ugc">Topic</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Background Slideshow shifted if Section is stretched and has Full Width layout (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13750" rel="nofollow ugc">#13750</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/slide-show-background-2/" rel="ugc">Topic</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/slider-background-section-layout-issue/" rel="ugc">Topic</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/elementor-v-3-0-16-breaks-full-width-header/" rel="ugc">Topic</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Entrance animation set to <code>none</code> caused a delay in the widget load</li>
<li>Fix: Navigator rearrangement glitches when Optimized DOM experiment is active</li>
<li>Fix: Keyboard navigation isn&#8217;t working in Tabs widget when Accessibility Improvements experiment is active</li>
<li>Fix: Minor UI glitches in Experiments screen</li>
<li>Fix: Wrong check of a deprecated method caused a notice when <code>ELEMENTOR_DEBUG</code> is enabled</li>
<li>Fix: Arrow keys navigation is not working in Finder</li>
<li>Fix: Theme Style overrides icon size when set in <code>em</code> in Social Icon widget</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.1.0 &#8211; 2021-01-24</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Elementor Experiments &#8211; Experience new features before they&#8217;re officially released (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/elementor-experiments/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developer Documentation</a>)</li>
<li>New: Compatibility Tag &#8211; Make sure your website plugins are compatible with Elementor (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/compatibility-tag/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developer Documentation</a>)</li>
<li>Experiment: Landing Pages &#8211; Create beautiful landing pages in a streamlined workflow</li>
<li>Experiment: Accessibility Improvements &#8211; Make Elementor widgets more accessible (may include markup changes) (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13191" rel="nofollow ugc">#13191</a>)</li>
<li>Experiment: Improved performance by loading JS and Swiper assets conditionally in frontend (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8572" rel="nofollow ugc">#8572</a>, <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/experiment-optimized-asset-loading" rel="nofollow ugc">Developer Documentation</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Tabs widget accessibility (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11779" rel="nofollow ugc">#11779</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11561" rel="nofollow ugc">#11561</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added alignment options for Tabs widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11997" rel="nofollow ugc">#11997</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Font Awesome icons library to v5.15.1 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12057" rel="nofollow ugc">#12057</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added &#8220;Custom&#8221; Columns Gap option in Section element (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11978" rel="nofollow ugc">#11978</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Border Radius support in Google Maps widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11359" rel="nofollow ugc">#11359</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added dynamic capabilities to Tab Title control in Tabs widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9710" rel="nofollow ugc">#9710</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added dynamic capabilities to Toggle Content control in Toggle widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12405" rel="nofollow ugc">#12405</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>em</code> unit to Border Radius control in Button widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11561" rel="nofollow ugc">#11561</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Introduced a new method for attaching a JS handler to an element (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/a-new-method-for-attaching-a-js-handler-to-an-element/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developer Documentation</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added the option to add custom menu items in Site Settings (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/pull/13243" rel="nofollow ugc">Developer Documentation</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added an option to choose Text element HTML tag in Divider widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11499" rel="nofollow ugc">#11499</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>eicons</code> library to v5.10.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Refactored YouTube source to use YouTube API in Video widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added dynamic capabilities to Poster control in Video widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Global dropdown controls are now displayed for all user roles</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved browsers detection utility functionality</li>
<li>Tweak: Added &#8220;Find an Expert&#8221; link to the Admin Dashboard Overview widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added the new Theme Builder as a Finder item</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>+</code> icon in multi-select control for better UX</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Select2 controls load</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Elementor Beta (Developer Edition) promotion in WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Tweak: Migrated DOM Improvements to Elementor Experiments</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed redundant extra padding in responsive controls</li>
<li>Tweak: Modified the Theme Builder app link UI in the Admin Bar menu</li>
<li>Fix: Some keyboards layout cannot open the keyboard shortcuts dialog (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/6145" rel="nofollow ugc">#6145</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Change Page Layout doesn&#8217;t update the preview on the first attempt (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/13245" rel="nofollow ugc">#13245</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Update Post Title via Site Settings removes style from Post Title widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12605" rel="nofollow ugc">#12605</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Can&#8217;t rearrange items between sections in Navigator since WordPress 5.6 update (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12256" rel="nofollow ugc">#12256</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Double click needed to play YouTube video when Poster image exists in Video widget</li>
<li>Fix: Autoplay option doesn&#8217;t work in mobile devices when YouTube source is muted in Video widget</li>
<li>Fix: YouTube End Time option doesn&#8217;t work when Loop option is active in Video widget</li>
<li>Fix: Incompatible variable names in Base Swiper class and Elementor Pro carousels</li>
<li>Fix: Landing Pages menu item directs to the wrong page</li>
<li>Fix: Redundant spacing is added to WYSIWYG control if rich editing is disabled</li>
<li>Fix: Editor Autoplay is not working consistently in Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: Console errors are thrown when entering the Revisions menu in edge cases</li>
<li>Fix: Column height is not correct when Optimized DOM experiment is inactive</li>
<li>Fix: Wrong translation function caused errors in the Revisions panel</li>
<li>Fix: Widgets empty state is not visible in WordPress 5.6</li>
<li>Deprecated: See all deprecations to this version in our <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v3-1-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Deprecations Post</a></li>
</ul>

<h4>3.0.2 &#8211; 2020-08-26</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Added Select2 And File Import Components to Theme Builder application</li>

<li>Tweak: Updated video tutorials in Theme Builder</li>
<li>Fix: Column &amp; Section Elements fires <code>elementor/element/after_add_attributes</code> early (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12185" rel="nofollow ugc">#12185</a>, Props <a href="https://github.com/ibndawood" rel="nofollow ugc">@ibndawood</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: <code>hexdec()</code> returns a deprecation notice (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12161" rel="nofollow ugc">#12161</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Repeater controls issue after the moving to <code>container.repeaters</code> (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12239" rel="nofollow ugc">#12239</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12221" rel="nofollow ugc">#12221</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Column Widget Space is not working when DOM Improvement is disabled (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12256" rel="nofollow ugc">#12256</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/widgets-space-doesnt-work-after-updating-to-3-0/" rel="ugc">Topic</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Resetting a style throws JS errors</li>
<li>Fix: Repeater controls backwards compatibility</li>
<li>Fix: Global Color dropdown shows Primary as marked when a custom value is added</li>
<li>Fix: Adding new Global Fonts won&#8217;t be added to the dropdown list until page reloads</li>
<li>Fix: Clicking on the Theme Builder Logo reopens it</li>
<li>Fix: Finder gets loaded in preview iframes</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.0.1 &#8211; 2020-08-25</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Changed &#8220;Exit to Dashboard&#8221; and &#8220;View Page&#8221; panel menu links to use <code>&lt;a&gt;</code> tag</li>
<li>Fix: <code>set-error-handler</code> conflict with 3rd party addons that uses REST-API (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12219" rel="nofollow ugc">#12219</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Conflict between responsive options and the Navigator &#8220;Hide&#8221; option (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12123" rel="nofollow ugc">#12123</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Radio inputs layout breaks when using Multi-Step Form</li>
<li>Fix: Global typography popover glitch in RTL websites</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.0.0 &#8211; 2020-08-23</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Site Settings &#8211; manage your entire site within the Editor</li>
<li>New: Meet Global Fonts &#8211; the smartest way to manage your text styles (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1553" rel="nofollow ugc">#1553</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1863" rel="nofollow ugc">#1863</a>)</li>
<li>New: Meet Global Colors &#8211; manage your site colors more consistently (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1553" rel="nofollow ugc">#1553</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1324" rel="nofollow ugc">#1324</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Elementor&#8217;s frontend dynamic CSS rendering performance significantly (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8053" rel="nofollow ugc">#8053</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed <code>.elementor-inner</code>, <code>.elementor-row</code> and <code>.elementor-column-wrap</code> from DOM output to improve performance (#7351, #7817, Developers Blog Post &#8211; https://developers.elementor.com/dom-improvements-ahead-html-wrappers-removal-from-v3-0/)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added an option to set columns in Social Icons widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11295" rel="nofollow ugc">#11295</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Default Page Layout to Global Layout Settings (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4925" rel="nofollow ugc">#4925</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Made &#8216;z-index&#8217; control responsive in widgets Advanced tab (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10918" rel="nofollow ugc">#10918</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>rem</code> unit support for Padding and Margins controls (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2810" rel="nofollow ugc">#2810</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added control for setting link width in Icon List widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11945" rel="nofollow ugc">#11945</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added image Border Radius control to Image Box widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9301" rel="nofollow ugc">#9301</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added more Google Fonts subsets (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1630" rel="nofollow ugc">#1630</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1915" rel="nofollow ugc">#1915</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8186" rel="nofollow ugc">#8186</a>, Props <a href="https://github.com/andrejm" rel="nofollow ugc">@andrejm</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Lightbox accessibility (Props <a href="https://github.com/ramiy" rel="nofollow ugc">@ramiy</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added &#8220;Height&#8221; &amp; &#8220;Object Fit&#8221; controls to Image Widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10962" rel="nofollow ugc">#10962</a>, Props <a href="https://github.com/ramiy" rel="nofollow ugc">@ramiy</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a filter for allowing adding Google Fonts subsets (Props <a href="https://github.com/andrejm" rel="nofollow ugc">@andrejm</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed Elementor grid to work with CSS Variables (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/elementor-dropping-support-ie/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>eicons</code> library to <code>v5.9.1</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>e-gallery</code> library to <code>v1.2.0</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Dialog library to <code>v4.8.1</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Google Fonts list to 07/2020</li>
<li>Tweak: Added lazyload to Lightbox slideshow images</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed unused <code>elementor-edit-area-preview</code> class</li>
<li>Tweak: Adding support to Vimeo external links structure</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Masonry layout mechanism in Gallery widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Allow using Repeater control in page settings</li>
<li>Tweak: Save all Global settings to the Kit entity</li>
<li>Tweak: Converted schemes to Global variables</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated WeChat and Weibo social networks colors in Social Icons widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added font-family property to text-area control for better readability</li>
<li>Tweak: Migrated Elementor Style settings from WP dashboard to the Global Settings menu</li>
<li>Tweak: Added real-time JS handling to prevent redundant renders in Image Carousel widget and Background Slideshow</li>
<li>Tweak: Moved &#8220;Stretch Section&#8221; control to the end of layout settings in Section element</li>
<li>Tweak: Color tweaks to editor panel elements</li>
<li>Tweak: Minor UI improvements in the editor panel</li>
<li>Tweak: Added backup warning before major version plugin upgrade</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved dialog a11y to support more accessible lightbox close button</li>
<li>Tweak: Added infrastructure support for the new Theme Builder</li>
<li>Tweak: Added an option to set the mobile browser header color in supported devices</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed panel behavior when switching document to prevent laggy behavior</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Improved DOM Output option in Elementor settings to allow legacy mode of HTML DOM prior to v3.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed v2.9 reference from the Dynamic promotions</li>
<li>Fix: Image block alignment broken by Elementor general figure styling (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11906" rel="nofollow ugc">#11906</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9259" rel="nofollow ugc">#9259</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7331" rel="nofollow ugc">#7331</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Elementor posts aren&#8217;t properly imported with WordPress Importer v0.7 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11466" rel="nofollow ugc">#11466</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10744" rel="nofollow ugc">#10744</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11927" rel="nofollow ugc">#11927</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Divider can&#8217;t use <code>EM</code> font-size unit in Divider widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11352" rel="nofollow ugc">#11352</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Theme Style overrides Icon List items typography values when list items are links in Icon List widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/12021" rel="nofollow ugc">#12021</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Responsive glitch in Range control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11233" rel="nofollow ugc">#11233</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Multiple repeater controls in the same panel causes JS errors (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/11523" rel="nofollow ugc">#11523</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Multiple repeater control types in same panel glitches</li>
<li>Fix: Dark mode UI glitches in Display Conditions modal</li>
<li>Fix: The wrong video being opened in Media Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: Dark mode UI glitch in Display conditions modal</li>
<li>Fix: Connect issues when using non-latin character domains</li>
<li>Deprecated: See all deprecations to this version in our <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v3-0-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Deprecations Post</a></li>
</ul>

<h4>2.9.0 &#8211; 2020-02-10</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Theme Style &#8211; set your default HTML tags styling using Elementor (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/534" rel="nofollow ugc">#534</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Custom Link Attributes to Link Options to allow adding custom attributes to <code>&lt;a&gt;</code> tags (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5716" rel="nofollow ugc">#5716</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3642" rel="nofollow ugc">#3642</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9225" rel="nofollow ugc">#9225</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9079" rel="nofollow ugc">#9079</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Title &amp; Description to Lightbox (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9826" rel="nofollow ugc">#9826</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2502" rel="nofollow ugc">#2502</a>)</li>

<li>Tweak: Added direct sharing options in Lightbox (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2502" rel="nofollow ugc">#2502</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Zoom option in Lightbox (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9399" rel="nofollow ugc">#9399</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Moved <code>social-share.js</code> to Core instead of Pro (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/migration-of-modules-to-core-in-2-9/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Moved <code>link-actions.js</code> to Core instead of Pro and changed its name to <code>url-actions.js</code> (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/migration-of-modules-to-core-in-2-9/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added dynamic capabilities to Title control in Toggle widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10070" rel="nofollow ugc">#10070</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Disabled autocomplete feature from the Color Picker (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10030" rel="nofollow ugc">#10030</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Mix social network to recommended tab in Social Icons widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10099" rel="nofollow ugc">#10099</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed StumbleUpon social network from recommended tab in Social Icons widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10099" rel="nofollow ugc">#10099</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>i18n</code> function to translation string in DB upgrades manager (Props <a href="https://github.com/ramiy" rel="nofollow ugc">@ramiy</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>vh</code> and <code>em</code> size units to Max Width control in Image widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5376" rel="nofollow ugc">#5376</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>vh</code> and <code>em</code> size units to Spacer widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Exposed external API for Swiper instances (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/expose-swiper-in-elementor/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Pickr library to v1.5.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Dialogs Manager library to v4.7.5</li>
<li>Tweak: Added URL hash routing capability to Lightbox</li>
<li>Tweak: Refactored panel controls UI</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Font Awesome library to v5.12.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Converted <code>add_render_attributes</code> for custom links to <code>add_link_attributes()</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Added a mixin for <code>absolute-center</code> positioning</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>eicons</code> library to v5.6.1</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed <code>eicon-zoom-in</code> icon to <code>eicon-zoom-in-bold</code> in Template Library</li>
<li>Tweak: Allow background image and color being displayed in empty column</li>
<li>Tweak: Converted <code>editor-base.js</code> to ES6</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>featured_image</code> URL to frontend config</li>
<li>Tweak: Made minor UI tweaks to &#8220;Recalc&#8221; button in System Info</li>
<li>Tweak: Added inline editing capability to Progress Bar widget Title</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed redundant display conditions from Drop Cap section in Text Editor widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Remove redundant <code>label_block</code> parameters from control instances</li>
<li>Tweak: Added &#8216;alt&#8217; property when using SVG icons in Social Icons widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added translators comment explaining the <code>%s</code> placeholder in Video Provider control</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Pro features descriptive promotions to Editor panel</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Dynamic capabilities to be active by default in WYSIWYG Control</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed the position of all panel tooltips to appear above the controls</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced nerd icons with new Elementor emojis</li>
<li>Tweak: Added descriptive message suggesting backing up the Database before upgrading to Font Awesome 5</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed panel arrow icon to chevron</li>
<li>Tweak: Deprecated Typography section in Section &amp; Column elements for users who didn&#8217;t place values</li>
<li>Fix: <code>playsinline</code> attribute missing when setting self-hosted video to Play on Mobile in Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9892" rel="nofollow ugc">#9892</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Beta sign-up modal closes unexpectedly (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10355" rel="nofollow ugc">#10355</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: &#8220;Slides to Show&#8221; option doesn&#8217;t work on Tablet view in Image Carousel widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/10227" rel="nofollow ugc">#10227</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Previous and Next buttons are not displaying on Safari in Media Carousel&#8217;s Cube mode (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9725" rel="nofollow ugc">#9725</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Form style being reset adding MailChimp/Getresponse action in Form widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9313" rel="nofollow ugc">#9313</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Post Title and Archive Excerpt wrong values in edge cases</li>
<li>Fix: Wrong <code>&lt;select&gt;</code> field width in &#8220;Add New&#8221; dialog</li>
<li>Fix: Gap created by the &#8220;Add Media&#8221; button in Text Editor widget</li>
<li>Fix: &#8220;Insert Template&#8221; library button glitch</li>
<li>Fix: WordPress Media &#8216;Image Details&#8217; fields are 100% width instead of contained</li>
<li>Fix: Pause on hover can&#8217;t be disabled in Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: Aligned Dark UI Theme gradients in panel and library tabs</li>
<li>Fix: Category Select2 dropdown stays above the view on scroll in Template Library modal</li>
<li>Deprecated: See all deprecations to this version in our (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v2-9-0-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Deprecations Post</a>)</li>

<li>Tweak: Updated <code>e-icons</code> library to v5.5.0</li>

<li>Fix: Adding a link overrides the Title and Description colors in Testimonial widget</li>
<li>Fix: Removed redundant Editor Panel Spacer in Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: &#8220;Delete All Content&#8221; doesn&#8217;t close current widget editing options</li>
<li>Fix: Pause on hover option doesn&#8217;t work in Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: Limit transition duration in Ken Burns CSS only to <code>transform</code> property</li>
<li>Fix: Recommended tab icons don&#8217;t change when there&#8217;s more than one <code>Icons</code> control per widget</li>
<li>Fix: Hidden sticky section generates redundant scroll offset when using Anchors</li>
<li>Fix: Inserting a saved section as a template uses the same <code>ID</code></li>
<li>Fix: Double rendering of elements in Editor</li>
<li>Deprecated: See all deprecations to this version in our <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v2-8-0-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Deprecations Post</a></li>

<li>Tweak: Background videos now support Vimeo as a source (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1903" rel="nofollow ugc">#1903</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added the option to add Icon and Text to Divider widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7418" rel="nofollow ugc">#7418</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Converted all widgets JS handlers to ES6 classes (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/building-a-simple-custom-widget-with-javascript/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>, <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/creating-a-new-widget/adding-javascript-to-elementor-widgets/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Documentation</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added option to select the version you rollback to in &#8220;Version Control&#8221; tool</li>
<li>Tweak: Use <code>swiper.js</code> instead of <code>slick.js</code> in Image Carousel widget (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/elementor-2-7-moving-sliders-from-slick-to-swiper/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Implemented virtual list render in Icons Library to improve performance and stability</li>
<li>Tweak: Added support of <code>wp_body_open</code> in Canvas template</li>
<li>Tweak: Editor Panel UI tweaks</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Gallery control UI</li>
<li>Tweak: Moved structure control into section panel in Section element</li>
<li>Tweak: Added option to allow background video to play on mobile devices if device support it</li>
<li>Tweak: Added more post statuses to show in the Finder (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8175" rel="nofollow ugc">#8175</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>Space-around</code>, <code>Space-between</code> and <code>Space-evenly</code> to Vertical Align options in Section element</li>
<li>Tweak: Added filter for additional styles by 3rd party plugins <code>elementor/divider/styles/additional_styles</code> to Divider widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed &#8220;Need Help?&#8221; button from WP widgets</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>Eicons</code> library to v5.4.0</li>
<li>Fix: Background video plays on mobile devices in some cases (#8782, <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/background-video-in-mobile-mode/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Icon List alignment issue (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8539" rel="nofollow ugc">#8539</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Two clicks needed to start Vimeo videos with image overlay</li>
<li>Fix: Init navigator only once when changing page template</li>
<li>Fix: Added backwards compatibility for <code>Controls_Manager::add_tab()</code> and <code>\Elementor\Core\Settings\Manager::add_settings_manager()</code></li>
<li>Fix: Carousels navigation arrows causes horizontal scroll when setting to <code>Outside</code></li>
<li>Fix: Heading widget with the character &#8220;0&#8221; is not visible on frontend</li>
<li>Deprecated: Removed old deprecated aliases (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v2-7-0-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Blog Post</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.6.7 &#8211; 2019-07-30</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Run <code>.htaccess</code> inspection only when needed</li>

<li>Tweak: <code>get_style_depends</code> styles are now loaded in editor preview</li>
<li>Fix: Avoid false-positive editor loading error (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8706" rel="nofollow ugc">#8706</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Disable browser suggestions on panel elements search input (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/6581" rel="nofollow ugc">#6581</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Contributor role can view other contributors draft and pending posts when Elementor is installed (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8689" rel="nofollow ugc">#8689</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Save changed before previewing a revision</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.6.6 &#8211; 2019-07-23</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix: WordPress editor is open by default (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8628" rel="nofollow ugc">#8628</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8647" rel="nofollow ugc">#8647</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Icon spacing disappeared after upgrading to Font Awesome 5 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8609" rel="nofollow ugc">#8609</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Star icon appears instead of an unset icon in Icon Box widget after upgrading to Font Awesome 5 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8596" rel="nofollow ugc">#8596</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Empty icon library by Using JS files instead of JSON for icon lists</li>
<li>Fix: <code>Preview Could Not be Loaded</code> message displayed if <code>$_SERVER['SERVER_SOFTWARE']</code> is empty</li>
<li>Fix: Navigator Indicators RTL UI glitches</li>

<h4>2.6.0 &#8211; 2019-07-09</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Icon Manager &#8211; the new way to add icons into your page (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/110" rel="nofollow ugc">#110</a>)</li>
<li>New: Introducing SVG file library (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5570" rel="nofollow ugc">#5570</a>)</li>
<li>New: Replaced Font Awesome 4 with Font Awesome 5 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4430" rel="nofollow ugc">#4430</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Help links to elements for better support flow</li>
<li>New: Added Navigator indicators for Custom Position (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2180" rel="nofollow ugc">#2180</a>)</li>
<li>New: Introducing Deprecated Notice control for developers (<a href="https://developers.elementor.com/elementor-controls/deprecated-notice-control/" rel="nofollow ugc">Development Doc</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added 9:16 Aspect ratio (vertical video) support for Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7051" rel="nofollow ugc">#7051</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Set pre-selected attachment when opening the media modal (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7937" rel="nofollow ugc">#7937</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added more style options for Progress Bar widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3413" rel="nofollow ugc">#3413</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added icon alignment option to icon list (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8219" rel="nofollow ugc">#8219</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added option to hide columns in Navigator (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7863" rel="nofollow ugc">#7863</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added vertical alignment option to Image Carousel (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/6963" rel="nofollow ugc">#6963</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Responsive option for the Content Align in Column (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2554" rel="nofollow ugc">#2554</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed <code>Prevent Scroll</code> option from Google Maps widget which now defaults in the map origin (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8244" rel="nofollow ugc">#8244</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Reduce-motion accessibility support for CSS animation library (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7968" rel="nofollow ugc">#7968</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added start &amp; end time for self-hosted background video (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7941" rel="nofollow ugc">#7941</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Play once option for background video (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5129" rel="nofollow ugc">#5129</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added the <code>playsinline</code> attribute to autoplay background video on iOS (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8198" rel="nofollow ugc">#8198</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>text-shadow</code> option to Button widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7317" rel="nofollow ugc">#7317</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Set <code>$fonts_to_enqueue</code> as public to allow manual enqueue of fonts (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7622" rel="nofollow ugc">#7622</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Show dashboard notices for admin role only (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7304" rel="nofollow ugc">#7304</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Viber icon for Social Icons widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4430" rel="nofollow ugc">#4430</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added dynamic capabilities to link control in Social Icons widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8097" rel="nofollow ugc">#8097</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added option to pick custom colors per icon in Social Icons widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4430" rel="nofollow ugc">#4430</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added default background color to Social Icons widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added opt-in form to Elementor updates for beta testers</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated E-icons library to v5.3.2</li>
<li>Tweak: Removed all Font Awesome 4 dependencies</li>
<li>Tweak: Clear 3rd party cache plugins on every change in Maintenance Mode</li>
<li>Tweak: Using <code>application/json</code> content type in order to avoid double zipping by the server to reduce load panel errors</li>
<li>Tweak: Added control to support Exit Animations</li>
<li>Tweak: Added editor notices bar for admin role only</li>
<li>Tweak: Moved elements PHP handles to JS &#8211; resolves double Editing Handles in the Post Content widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added custom messages for &#8220;Preview could not be loaded&#8221; state</li>
<li>Tweak: Added focus state emphasis to Dimensions control</li>
<li>Tweak: Redesigned Media control</li>
<li>Tweak: Use <code>wp_register_style</code> to allow widgets to enqueue icon styles</li>
<li>Fix: Open the correct video when you have multiple images with the same video link in the same Media Carousel (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8047" rel="nofollow ugc">#8047</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added escaping in the template type (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8435" rel="nofollow ugc">#8435</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Compression encoding for <code>gzip</code> to <code>brotli</code> conversions (Props <a href="https://github.com/pingram3541" rel="nofollow ugc">@pingram3541</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Vimeo video lightbox is not playing automatically</li>
<li>Fix: Backslash was removed from Custom CSS in page settings</li>
<li>Fix: Set LTR direction only to <code>input</code> and <code>textarea</code> in RTL view</li>
<li>Fix: Color Picker UI glitches in RTL view</li>
<li>Fix: Avoid adding CSS for the first post in archive pages</li>
</ul>

<li>Tweak: Improved editor loading time and performance by ~50%</li>
<li>Tweak: Remember last editing tab per element in the editor panel for better workflow (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/7087" rel="nofollow ugc">#7087</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added text shadow &amp; background color controls for caption in Image widget (Props <a href="https://github.com/ramiy" rel="nofollow ugc">@ramiy</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added access to super admin role in Maintenance Mode (Props <a href="https://github.com/GermanKrutov" rel="nofollow ugc">@GermanKrutov</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added vw unit support for Typography size control</li>
<li>Tweak: Added vw unit support for Custom Min. Height control in section</li>
<li>Tweak: Added overflow option for section</li>
<li>Tweak: Renamed <code>Content Position</code> control to <code>Vertical Align</code> in column layout</li>

<h4>2.4.5 &#8211; 2019-01-30</h4>

<li>Tweak: Update Eicons v3.9.2</li>
<li>Fix: Added default width for SVG image to support edge cases (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5987" rel="nofollow ugc">#5987</a>)</li>

<li>Fix: Allow plugins to set current page as Login Page for Maintenance Mode</li>
<li>Fix: Added navigation between tabs via tab keyboard for better accessibility</li>
<li>Fix: Use Thumbnail if selected size is missing</li>
<li>Fix: A new method to handle with multiple image custom sizes</li>
<li>Fix: Import template by WP CLI</li>
<li>Fix: Height of bar without content in Progress Bar widget</li>
<li>Fix: Added compatibility with a new embed API of YouTube</li>
<li>Fix: Don&#8217;t render wrapper of element if the content is empty</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>Source_Local::TYPE_META_KEY</code> is no longer supported</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>Document::save_type()</code> is replaced by <code>Document::save_template_type()</code></li>
</ul>

<ul>

<li>Fix: <code>on-paste</code> check for Choose control</li>
<li>Fix: <code>fixed</code> positions for Color Picker</li>
<li>Fix: Removed empty space from <code>elementor/document/urls/edit</code> hook name (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5216" rel="nofollow ugc">#5216</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Dynamic tags support in Shortcode widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5214" rel="nofollow ugc">#5214</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.4 &#8211; 2018-07-18</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Show modified date instead of publish date on Dashboard widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4169" rel="nofollow ugc">#4169</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Selector for CSS Filters control in column</li>
<li>Fix: CSS Filters for self hosted video</li>
<li>Fix: Avoid creating unnecessary CSS for widgets</li>
<li>Fix: Added backward compatibility for deprecated controls</li>
<li>Fix: Color Picker control value change detection</li>
<li>Fix: Avoid multiple ready trigger in preview</li>
<li>Fix: Save default page template</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.3 &#8211; 2018-07-16</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Added CSS filter control for Map, Video, Section and Column</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Inspector option in Tools page</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Inspector log for Canvas &amp; Full Width templates</li>
<li>Tweak: The preview is now loading via plain URL to avoid errors in some server configurations</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>print_elements_with_wrapper</code> method to allow a document to overwrite it&#8217;s wrapper</li>
<li>Tweak: Added action hook <code>elementor/template-library/after_get_source_data</code></li>
<li>Fix: Page template missing after import (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4498" rel="nofollow ugc">#4498</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Maintenance Mode override theme template</li>
<li>Fix: Removed focus and active states from Hover Animations</li>
<li>Fix: Prevent submit forms in the preview</li>
<li>Fix: Disable history tracking when restoring a revision</li>
<li>Fix: Empty history changes after restoring a revision</li>
<li>Fix: Paste style on control with groups</li>
<li>Fix: Avoid overwrite <code>_wp_page_template</code> in edge cases</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.2 &#8211; 2018-07-08</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Set active/inactive category by <code>'active' =&gt; false</code> (default is <code>true</code>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added forms input style compatibility for some themes</li>
<li>Fix: XML Demo Import compatibility for admin based imports (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4947" rel="nofollow ugc">#4947</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Set correct <code>post_id</code> when call <code>enqueue_scripts</code> from preview mode</li>
<li>Fix: Conditions not working on dynamic backgrounds</li>
<li>Fix: Paste of multiple content in Add Section Area</li>
<li>Fix: Set lower priority to <code>template_include</code> hook to override 3rd party plugins, e.g. WooCommerce</li>
<li>Fix: Hide Save Widget as Global button for old versions</li>
<li>Fix: Added RTL style for section with handles inside</li>
<li>Deprecated: Restore <code>get_page</code> method as hard deprecated (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4870" rel="nofollow ugc">#4870</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.1.0 &#8211; 2018-07-03</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing Elementor Context Menu</li>
<li>New: Copy/Paste elements (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4151" rel="nofollow ugc">#4151</a>)</li>
<li>New: Copy/Paste element style (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1479" rel="nofollow ugc">#1479</a>)</li>
<li>New: Copy/Paste between pages</li>
<li>New: Reset element style</li>
<li>New: Added <code>copy_all_content</code> option</li>
<li>New: Change mobile &amp; tablet breakpoints (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/78" rel="nofollow ugc">#78</a>)</li>
<li>New: Introducing Elementor WP-CLI integration (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2161" rel="nofollow ugc">#2161</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added collapsable panel categories (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3805" rel="nofollow ugc">#3805</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Self hosted videos with HTML5 for Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3313" rel="nofollow ugc">#3313</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Dailymotion provider for Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2285" rel="nofollow ugc">#2285</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added start/end controls for Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3565" rel="nofollow ugc">#3565</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added new icons to Social Icons widget: Android &amp; Thumbtack (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4235" rel="nofollow ugc">#4235</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4486" rel="nofollow ugc">#4486</a>)</li>
<li>New: Hotkey: Ctrl / Cmd + C = Copy</li>
<li>New: Hotkey: Ctrl / Cmd + V = Paste</li>
<li>Tweak: Added CSS Filter group control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3260" rel="nofollow ugc">#3260</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added CSS Filters to Image &amp; Image Box widgets</li>
<li>Tweak: Added compatibility with Gutenberg 3.0.+ (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2631" rel="nofollow ugc">#2631</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added CSS ID for Button widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4535" rel="nofollow ugc">#4535</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added keywords to all widgets for more accurate filtering</li>
<li>Tweak: Replace hover section with tabs Icon &amp; Icon Box widgets</li>
<li>Tweak: Moved <code>delete all content</code> to the page level right click</li>
<li>Tweak: When converting content with only a shortcode to Elementor, a shortcode widget used instead of Text Editor widget (#4616)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Swiper library to v4.3.3 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4170" rel="nofollow ugc">#4170</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>elementor/shapes/additional_shapes</code> filter hook to allow custom shape dividers (#4759)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added video support to media control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4066" rel="nofollow ugc">#4066</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Dropped Support for WP v4.6, now supporting WP v4.7+</li>
<li>Fix: The <code>wpColorPicker</code> will not be updated after emptying the value</li>
<li>Fix: Added fallback for injection position when the injection control does not exist</li>
<li>Fix: Focus state behavior in the Repeater control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4596" rel="nofollow ugc">#4596</a>)</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>Repeater::get_fields()</code> is replaced by <code>Repeater::get_controls()</code></li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>Element_Base::get_parent()</code> is replaced by <code>Element_Base::get_data( 'parent' )</code></li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>get_class_controls</code> is no longer supported</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>\Elementor\settings\page\manager::get_page()</code> is now removed (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/4870" rel="nofollow ugc">#4870</a>)</li>
</ul>

<li>Tweak: Remember the last library tab and search/filters that was open</li>

<li>Tweak: Icon widget accessibility &#8211; added <code>aria-hidden</code> attribute to the <code>i</code> tag (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3272" rel="nofollow ugc">#3272</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Icon Box widget accessibility &#8211; added <code>aria-hidden</code> attribute to the <code>i</code> tag (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3273" rel="nofollow ugc">#3273</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Google Maps widget accessibility &#8211; added <code>aria-label</code> attribute to the <code>iframe</code> tag (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3274" rel="nofollow ugc">#3274</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Moved <code>placeholder</code> and <code>title</code> settings from base control settings into individual controls that use them (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3795" rel="nofollow ugc">#3795</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated the &#8220;Icon Box&#8221; widget to handle cases where no icon is set</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated the way widget categories are registered in Elementor (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3729" rel="nofollow ugc">#3729</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Slick.js library Updated to v1.8.1 (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3538" rel="nofollow ugc">#3538</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Eicons to v3.0.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Select2 to v4.0.5</li>
<li>Fix: Document settings now saved as revisions on auto save (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3510" rel="nofollow ugc">#3510</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Show preset section in the right side for RTL</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.9.8 &#8211; 2018-03-12</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Activate publish button if there is an auto-save version</li>
<li>Fix: Server error message missing in edge cases</li>
<li>Fix: Updated dialog library (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3668" rel="nofollow ugc">#3668</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Text Decoration option in Button Widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3701" rel="nofollow ugc">#3701</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added <code>autopause=0</code> in order to allow multiple autoplay in Vimeo video</li>
<li>Fix: Added missing translation string to control in the Image Carousel widget</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.9.7 &#8211; 2018-02-27</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: <code>Element_Base::get_style_depends()</code> method is now overwritable (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3494" rel="nofollow ugc">#3494</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: &#8220;Enter&#8221; key triggers Elementor mode instead of default submit action (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3556" rel="nofollow ugc">#3556</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Stop showing Connection Lost notification when editing widgets</li>
<li>Fix: Counter widget &#8211; Allow spacing between prefix and suffix</li>
</ul>

<li>Tweak: Replaced <code>jquery-simple-dtpicker</code> with <code>flatpickr</code> JS library (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2095" rel="nofollow ugc">#2095</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Reduced panel clutter by allowing group control to be displayed as a popup</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Gutenberg compatibility &#8211; &#8220;Add New Elementor&#8221; and &#8220;Back to Classic&#8221; edit screen</li>

<li>Tweak: Added <code>text-decoration</code> to Typography control</li>
<li>Tweak: All functions, action hooks and filter hooks have been documented</li>
<li>Tweak: Implementing inline editing functionality in various Elementor widgets</li>
<li>Tweak: Accessible widget search &#8211; add label for screen readers in the search box (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2835" rel="nofollow ugc">#2835</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved Editor accessibility &#8211; replace <code>title</code> attributes with <code>aria-label</code> (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2861" rel="nofollow ugc">#2861</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Progress Bar widget accessibility &#8211; set correct <code>role</code> and added new <code>aria</code> attributes (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2861" rel="nofollow ugc">#2861</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Alert widget accessibility &#8211; make the &#8220;Dismiss&#8221; button accessible (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/3108" rel="nofollow ugc">#3108</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Tabs widget accessibility &#8211; added <code>id</code>, <code>role</code> and <code>aria</code> attributes (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2913" rel="nofollow ugc">#2913</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Toggle widget accessibility &#8211; added <code>id</code>, <code>role</code> and <code>aria</code> attributes (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2836" rel="nofollow ugc">#2836</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Accordion widget accessibility &#8211; added <code>id</code>, <code>role</code> and <code>aria</code> attributes (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2836" rel="nofollow ugc">#2836</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Social Icons widget accessibility &#8211; added labels for screen readers</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Browser support notification for unsupported browsers</li>
<li>Tweak: Depended styles, various elements can set stylesheet dependencies (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1636" rel="nofollow ugc">#1636</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added option to set control as required by <code>required =&gt; true</code></li>
<li>Fix: Added <code>wptexturize</code> filter to match WordPress native text formatting</li>
<li>Fix: Alignment issue with Icon widget</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.7.0 &#8211; 2017-08-28</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: History actions in the editor (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/266" rel="nofollow ugc">#266</a>)</li>
<li>New: Hotkey: Ctrl / Cmd + Z = Undo</li>
<li>New: Hotkey: Ctrl / Cmd + Shift + Z = Redo</li>
<li>New: Hotkey: Ctrl / Cmd + D = Duplicate</li>
<li>New: Hotkey: Delete = Delete element</li>
<li>New: Added more icons to Social Icons widget: Weibo &amp; WeChat</li>
<li>Tweak: Added color control for UI elements in the lightbox</li>
<li>Tweak: Allow to exclude devices in responsive control</li>
<li>Tweak: Added compatibility for Table of Contents Plus plugin (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2248" rel="nofollow ugc">#2248</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added compatibility for Multisite installation with Domain Mapping</li>
<li>Fix: CSS Animations names no longer minified, in order to prevent unexpected conflicts</li>
<li>Fix: Sometimes content in Repeater control disappears</li>
<li>Fix: Conflict rollback to the last version when beta testing mode enabled</li>
<li>Fix: Conflict with Polylang plugin (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2124" rel="nofollow ugc">#2124</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Allow fullscreen in the editor preview for video player</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.5 &#8211; 2017-08-20</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: Added compatibility for the future release of Elementor Pro</li>
<li>Fix: Set font size inherit for Heading widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2098" rel="nofollow ugc">#2098</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Anchor links smooth scrolling not working when admin bar is disabled (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2210" rel="nofollow ugc">#2210</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.6.0 &#8211; 2017-08-02</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://elementor.com/v160-image-lightbox/" rel="nofollow ugc">Read more in the release post</a></li>
<li>New: Added native Lightbox for images and galleries (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/218" rel="nofollow ugc">#218</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Text Shadow control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1696" rel="nofollow ugc">#1696</a>) (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/blob/master/docs/content/controls/_text-shadow.md" rel="nofollow ugc">Developer API</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Text Shadow option for Heading widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1940" rel="nofollow ugc">#1940</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added bulk import / export for template library (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1241" rel="nofollow ugc">#1241</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added <code>elementor/widgets/wordpress/widget_args</code> filter to customize WP widget markup (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2052" rel="nofollow ugc">#2052</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: The editor loading now in the wp-admin area instead of the front-end</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced editor icons from FontAwesome to Eicons for beautiful sharpness</li>
<li>Tweak: Added library access to all users with <code>edit_pages</code> capability</li>
<li>Tweak: Loading scripts from the preview for more accurate front-end simulation and fix some issues</li>
<li>Tweak: Replaced textarea input with WYSIWYG control for Testimonial widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1321" rel="nofollow ugc">#1321</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed default play icon for Video widget</li>
<li>Tweak: First step to move Autoloader classes method</li>
<li>Tweak: Switcher control <code>label_on</code> and <code>label_off</code> is not required anymore (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/blob/master/docs/content/controls/_switcher.md" rel="nofollow ugc">Developer API</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Style settings now also in the editor (under &gt; menu &gt; general settings)</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed the colors of editor loading screen to positive design</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Mute option for YouTube in Video widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1897" rel="nofollow ugc">#1897</a>)</li>
<li>Twaek! &#8211; Added compatibility for Polylang plugin (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1959" rel="nofollow ugc">#1959</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Unknown text input in Group Controls (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1926" rel="nofollow ugc">#1926</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Show edit with Elementor button on admin bar in regular posts</li>
<li>Fix: Inherit style for select field from field</li>
<li>Fix: Conflict with ManageWP on Multisite (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1600" rel="nofollow ugc">#1600</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1456" rel="nofollow ugc">#1456</a>)</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>elementor/controls/get_available_tabs_controls</code> filter, please use <code>\Elementor\Controls_Manager::add_tab( $tab_name, $tab_title )</code> instead of</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.5.0 &#8211; 2017-06-28</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: A big UI makeover to the editor for the 1st birthday of Elementor (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/493" rel="nofollow ugc">#493</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/335" rel="nofollow ugc">#335</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/692" rel="nofollow ugc">#692</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added responsive mode for Column Width control, including Tablet! (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/418" rel="nofollow ugc">#418</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added option to set the column width trough the panel (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/847" rel="nofollow ugc">#847</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Element Hover for Background, BG Overlay, Border &amp; Box Shadow</li>
<li>New: Added <code>nofollow</code> option for all link controls (<a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/elementor-nofollow-links-is-there-a-way-to-specify-links-nofollow-attribute/" rel="ugc">Topic</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/953" rel="nofollow ugc">#953</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1695" rel="nofollow ugc">#1695</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added HTML Tag for Section &amp; Column (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1619" rel="nofollow ugc">#1619</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Inset option for Box shadow control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1623" rel="nofollow ugc">#1623</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added option to rollback to a previous version of Elementor &amp; Pro</li>
<li>New: Added option to get update notifications for beta versions of Elementor &amp; Pro</li>
<li>New: Added Space Between Widgets option under global settings and per column (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1221" rel="nofollow ugc">#1221</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Z-Index option for all elements and removed original default <code>z-index</code> from <code>widgets-wrap</code> (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1743" rel="nofollow ugc">#1743</a>)</li>
<li>New: Import template get the page settings also if available</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Tabs UI for admin setting pages</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Layout tab for column for better workflow</li>
<li>Tweak: Elementor not active when WP version doesn&#8217;t meet minimum requirements</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Animation Delay to Entrance Animation for all elements (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/558" rel="nofollow ugc">#558</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved panel accessibility by adding <code>for</code> to the labels</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for min-height in Section (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/630" rel="nofollow ugc">#630</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for image size in Image / Image Box widgets</li>
<li>Tweak: Added PX unit &amp; responsive control for border width in Divider widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for gap in Divider widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for spacing in Image Box widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for slides to show control in Image Carousel</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for border radius in Image widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed video embed method for better performance and fix loading bug</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed <code>the_content</code> priority for better integration with 3rd party plugins (e.g WooCommerce Membership)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added WP filter to get available image sizes</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Swiper library to 3.4.2</li>
<li>Tweak: Limit up to 100 revisions to display in the panel for better performance</li>
<li>Fix: YouTube link detection regex for some situations</li>
<li>Fix: Content flashes before entrance animation (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1672" rel="nofollow ugc">#1672</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added <code>latin-ext</code> subset in Font control for Czech language (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1630" rel="nofollow ugc">#1630</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Restore to post version without Elementor in Revision History</li>
<li>Fix: Removed <code>margin: 0</code> setting from figure inside text editor widget</li>
<li>Fix: Content flashes before entrance animation (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1672" rel="nofollow ugc">#1672</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Bug Image Carousel widget in RTL direction</li>
<li>Fix: <code>show_label</code> affected inner label in the repeater control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1707" rel="nofollow ugc">#1707</a>)</li>
</ul>

<li>New: <code>Added action elementor/editor/before_enqueue_styles</code> &#8211; runs before enqueue styles in the Editor</li>
<li>New: <code>Added action elementor/editor/after_enqueue_scripts</code> &#8211; runs after enqueue scripts in Editor</li>

<li>Tweak: Added new tool for editor loader method</li>
